author: {'steamid': '76561198098775155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 892, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1657353717}
review: Está entretenido. Te pegas 1 hora jugando con la única intención de combinar personajes con cosas solo para ver en qué se convierten, y durante el proceso, descubres que el sistema de batalla tan simple del tutorial se queda en eso solamente. En el PvP gana literalmente el que más horas le ha echado al juego. No hay balance. ¿Vas a empezar a jugar? Con suerte te saldrá una carta rara que servirá para aguantar un poquito más contra una carta ultra rara que tendrá más defensa que todo el ataque combinado que tengas. A lo mejor mañana vuelvo, y a lo mejor mañana pensaré de una forma distinta, pero el juego no avanzará...

author: {'steamid': '76561198011864330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 37429, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24409, 'last_played': 1680811403}
review:
Don't play this on PC. Stick with the mobile app. The PC version is a very badly ported version with virtually none of the functionality.

I played this for ages on the PC before even thinking about trying the app, and now I realize I've wasted literally HUNDREDS of hours as a result. The problem is, the app is completely dependent on ads for speeding everything up and increasing bonuses etc., all of which you miss out on with the ad-free PC port.

To give you an example: you'll want to merge your cards to make playable combos. There are 3 research stations in the app, but only 2 on the PC. (There's some mention of how you can buy something to open up the third one, but they never implemented it.) To merge 2 purple cards takes 2 days. However, in the app you can watch 3 ads to reduce that to 1 day. On top of that, the merge you're doing in the third research station can be reduced to 6 hours by, you guessed it, watching another 3 ads. So, simple maths says that playing on the PC, in 2 days you can do 2 merges, whereas on the app you can do 12! So, you'll progress at a sixth of the speed of app players. 

Plus, the bonuses you get from watching ads expire every 4 hours, so even if you do watch all your ads and then switch over to playing on PC, you'll need to go back to the app to watch more ads to restart the bonuses.

TLDR: it's actually a really fun card battler and I highly recommend it - but only on your phone!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198139242181', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1599960830}
review:
my wife and I played this game for years (mostly mobile) and have spent way too much on it we were both in multiple top 10-25 guilds and played EVERYDAY.  The game started out amazing with the pay to win curve very low but after a year or so the curve was insane and last i played (a few months ago) the curve was off the charts were if you dont pay you have no chance.  Really a sad turn for an amazing fun game, best to not even get started now the first hill is very high. 


TLDR: unless you want to add a second mortgage to your house stay away!

author: {'steamid': '76561197998984505', 'num_games_owned': 660, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 23140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1673560848}
review:
no way to change resolution on windowed mode.
no way to skip tutorial, and no way to change settings during the said tutorial to for example disable music/sound.

EDIT:

played about 2 years in this game and got pretty far.
had to reinstall windows but kept the steam folders in tact.

despite keeping the game files, the game for some reason restarted from scratch
no problem, right? i linked my progress to Kongregate. 
so, instead of suffering through the unskippable "training" i clicked on the K expecting for my progress to be synced up after logging in.

instead, i got a message saying my account has been linked, and the intro training continued. 
my progress is all gone.

if i had spent money on this dumpster fire i would have been pissed

author: {'steamid': '76561198120296262', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1646135604}
review: I have one complaint. There are no options to change the screen settings, so you can only play this full screen. It's not a full screen kind of game, so why that's not an option is something I can only fathom. It's funny and it hits on all the popular jokes from the shows, but it doesn't make up for the fact that you can only play this in full screen, so it's a hard pass for me. This is more like a time killer kind of game while you're watching YouTube or doing something else. Sorry but for that I have to give it a thumbs down. It's 2022, there's no reason for a PC game to not have the simplest of options.

author: {'steamid': '76561198402000462', 'num_games_owned': 35, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1607190511}
review: This game is literally the definition of pay2win, and I've played pvz heroes. Speaking of which, this game seems like a direct ripoff of pvz heroes. literally identical mechanics, just different faces on the cards, and a bigger emphasis on fusion. Game gets extremely repetitive after the first few missions, and difficulty spikes rather early, forcing you to either grind for hours on end, or pay up for better cards. speaking of which, the card packs are far too expensive for what they give you. 1000 coins for ONE card? Are you kidding me? And you can't get more cards just by playing the campaign, either. your only option is the buy cards from these expensive af packs with little to no payoff, or to buy things with real money. I would highly recommend against downloading this game, simply to keep this terrible excuse for a program off of your system.

author: {'steamid': '76561198318544783', 'num_games_owned': 431, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1852, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1687, 'last_played': 1646346007}
review:
Realmente é um jogo de cartas bem relevante principalmente pelas suas combinações de cartas onde da pra você fundir uma carta de um desenho totalmente diferente do outro e se transformando em algo q apareceu no desenho da carta principal do combo.

O game é bem fácil n tem nada de complicado indicara você rushar o modo arena e focar em pegar nível 10 porque tem uma mecânica de você meio  não precisar jogar cada partida meio q o jogo simula q você esta jogando e isso acelera muito o game.

O modo arena e o modo pra defender as ilhas vi muita gente dizendo que o game não é pay to win sendo que basicamente eu só jogava contra caras com cartas lendárias e de nível alto ok ok o cara deu sorte mas ter 5 lendárias no mesmo nivel que o meu é um pouco apelo pra quem n tem nenhuma.

Bem para concluir tudo isso recomendo o game é um bom passa tempo ainda mais pra quem ter um pc meme e adora jogos de carta.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078187468', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 4380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4378, 'last_played': 1643909225}
review:
Lo bueno: 

- El juego es fácil de aprender.
- Te puede enganchar.
- Tiene la mayoría de los personajes animados de la FOX.
- Los logros son fáciles (Yo los tengo todos).
- No hace falta gastar dinero para llegar a conseguir cosas buenas o el nivel máximo.

Lo malo: 

- Es totalmente pay to win. 
- El emparejamiento PVP está desbalanceado.
- No está los Simpsons

Te emparejan a menudo gente con cartas compradas de rareza amarilla (Solo se consigue gastando dinero y quedando entre los primeros en los eventos) que son terriblemente fuertes y a no ser que tengas una baraja de la segunda rareza más fuerte (O sea morada) va a perder siempre. También hay ventajas para los que pagan como las investigaciones de combos lo acortan a la mitad y les da más capacidad de cartas y más puntos para la historia.
Aunque la cosa es que si tienes paciencia puedes conseguir cartas muy buenas gratis y llegarte al máximo nivel del PVP (Como yo), pero tardarás muchísimo más tiempo.

El juego es recomendable, pero lo dicho, avisado estás.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174890043', 'num_games_owned': 362, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 8733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3916, 'last_played': 1647097922}
review: I'm not really sure what keeps me playing this game but I've been playing it every day since I downloaded it. It's easy to learn and pretty fun to play. The cards are pretty funny if you're familiar with the sources or can be even if you aren't. I kind of wish some of the other Fox cartoons were here like The Simpsons and I have yet to see any references of Cleveland in the Family Guy cards, maybe because he had his own show too but they could have put him in. I saw New Brian, for crying out loud, surely they could have Cleveland. Anyways, if you like card games and time to kill go ahead and give this game a try, I don't think you'll be disappointed. It's free to play too so that's always a plus. There are in game purchases but I have yet to spend any actual money and I'm doing just fine. I have collected some pretty strong cards and am working my way through.

author: {'steamid': '76561199103573212', 'num_games_owned': 582, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1642273164}
review:
It's awful...

Every single aspect of this game makes it the by far the worst mobile game I think I have ever played!! I mean I wasn't expecting much from a mobile game, I was expecting a sudden grind wall to make me want to spend money to experience the rest of it "even though I never would" but it can't even do that right. It doesn't even make you want to spend money! 

The story is forgettable, I just played it an hour ago an I already forget it, something like a bomb going off and then all the characters are in a shared reality on these stupid floating islands, the characters all feel the need to introduce themselves "as if you didn't have any idea who they were" breaking the immersion of the story that shouldn't have been there in the first place. The gameplay is public school subtraction and addition which is mind numbingly easy I think I lost 1 out of 20 games just because the other player had a really OP card, and the sound!! Well the characters aren't voiced and you're listening to this constant looping simpsons sounding theme that will make you want to pull your hair out... I've experienced more joy changing the garbage or flushing the toilet.

In conclusion, There is no reason you should enjoy this game. You will even be disappointed in your favorite characters as they repeat popular quotes from the show that are unvoiced and text based... over.. and over!... AND OOVERR !!.........

author: {'steamid': '76561198073899785', 'num_games_owned': 610, 'num_reviews': 121, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1660182089}
review:
Un juego de cartas comun y corriente...me recordo a cuando este tipo de juegos estaba de moda en los moviles...La verdad es que la tematica del juego me gusta pero que sea de cartas no...El juego esta bien, no tiene errores ni crasheos nada...pero es demasiado aburrido y casi nadie lo juega y como fanatico de todas las series presentes en este juego, me sorprendio a principio...los personajes con su personalidad y esas cosas me gusto pero el juego es muy aburrido y si quieres pasartelo adelante...Lo mejor y que valoro muchisimo es el simple hecho que no debes pagar por NADA asi es....por NADA...todo te lo puedes ganar con el tiempo...la IA es un poco astuta a medida que avanzas y se vuelve mas desafiante...No le doy positivo por el hecho de que me aburrio pero el juego con la tematica y por que no necesitas pagar por nada son cosas positivas que si tengo muy en cuenta...
P.D.: no te aconsejo comprar el DLC ya que todo te lo puedes ganar pero si quieres apoyar el juego adelante...
Tened un buen dia y Buen gaming

author: {'steamid': '76561198295702751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 12098, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12065, 'last_played': 1697520347}
review:
This game saved my life.

I am 41.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

author: {'steamid': '76561198809267261', 'num_games_owned': 374, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1191, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1191, 'last_played': 1638080284}
review:
[h1] This is more a Story than a Review [/h1][spoiler] a story with a moral [/spoiler]

[h1] how it's started [/h1]

it all started wen i finished all 7 seasons of futurama i wanted a game about futurama and i remembered this game that i have played previously on my phone a very long time ago so i installed the game with the goal of getting all the achievements  at less i wanted the cryogenic achievement if some day i wanted to make a futurama steam profile theme .

[h1] a start of a journey [/h1]

i started playing the game for 10 days maybe . and i wanted to get the achievements as fast as possible so i 
activate autoplay and 4x speed then i discovered that i can skip the whole match any way when you level up in the game your energy full up so i need to get 10 more xp and if i make an kongregate account ( the game developer company  ) i will receive 10 xp so i made one and it asked me if i want to synchro my account i pressed yes without reading and i lost all my progress it turn out i made a account when i was playing on my phone 
( in my pc save i completed almost 75% of the game maybe more and i was missing just 4 achievements ) and it turn out i did not finish the introduction on my phone so basically am back to the beginning so as any normal person will feel i got very annoyed i send a message to the developers if there is a way to get my old save back then lost hope and uninstalled the game .

[h1] an unexpected turn of events [/h1] 

after 4 or 6 days i decided to play the game on my phone in my spare time so i got the game on my phone and i noticed i have a lot of rewards it turn out i stated playing the game in 4/12/2017 and i got multiple rewards every year and now we are in 2021 so you can imagine how mach rewards i received lets just say in 1 hours i managed to do what i have done in 10 days and i completed more than the previous 75% . and after some days i got all the achievements .

[h1] the moral [/h1]

so what is the moral of the story 
i invest a lot of time in the game and i lost every thing in an instant after giving the game a second chance i managed to get more progress and better card so if something very bad happened to you just don't loss 
faith and hope maybe that some thing even better well come .
and don't gave up no matter how many times you fail

* this is the second time this happen to me the first time it was life changing so i wanted to write this very long review that have a very small chance of people finding it and even more small chance of finishing it .

[h1] if you really want a review [/h1]

it's a good game but it very laggy in the begining i don't know if it's just with me or with every one you have to be really patient to play it .

author: {'steamid': '76561198869779848', 'num_games_owned': 184, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1645814233}
review:
[h1] Вот такой кроссовер я бы посмотрел на большом экране [/h1]
Где-же еще можно обкастоваться креком и навалять Иисусу?

[h1] Мой мнение об игре  [/h1]
Игра очень интересная. Помню как залипал  в нее в телефоне, когда она появилась.  Вот в 2021 решил вспомнить про эту игру. Был рад, когда смог зайти на свой аккаунт и получил заслуженные достижения.

Скажу коротко о плюсах и минусах игры
[h1] Плюсы [/h1]
[olist]
    [*]Интересная сюжетная линия. Сюжет огромный - больше 30 глав.
    [*]Очень прикольные комбо карт. Смешные карточные комбо можно сделать в лаборатории.
    [*]Игру можно пройти без доната. Разработчики не навязывают покупками. Хочешь можешь задонатить, не хочешь - играйте без доната.
[/olist]

[h1]Минусы[/h1]
[olist]
    [*]Очень долго восстанавливается энергия. Приходится подождать, пока энергия восполнится
[/olist]

[h1]Стоит ли игра внимания?[/h1]
Ну тут у всех разные взгляды, но игра однозначно понравится любителям мультов от "FOX" и Сета Макфарлейна!

[h1]Общая оценка игры[/h1]
10/10

[h1]Спасибо за внимание![/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198138737588', 'num_games_owned': 102, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 39754, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10496, 'last_played': 1700425349}
review:
**REVISED***

About a year ago, I recommended this game.  Now, I am changing my review.

This is a pay-to-win type of game.  You can play for free, but you'll progress at a painfully slow rate.  Now, I don't have any problem with pay-to-win style games necessarily.  As long as they're providing entertainment and fun, I figure I'm paying less for a game than I would be to go to the movies, and it's more bang for your buck.  But the game has to be *fun*.  This game used to be.  Now it's not.

Over the last six months or so, the bugs have gotten progressively worse and worse and worse, and they're not being fixed.  Some cards don't show their characters.  Many cards and combos don't show their stats, making it impossible to effectively deck build.  The game crashes and freezes when you open rewards chests.  There are red notifications on the screen that never go away, even if there's no notification there to collect.  And the worst part of it is, Kongregate refuses to address these issues.  Even after multiple bug reports from players in the Discord community, Kongregate has basically told us all that they don't really believe that these issues are as widespread as we claim, and they refuse to help us.  But they're sure in a hurry every week to roll out new content at higher prices, which just breaks the game even more.

Even having received this game for free, it's become so annoying as to become unplayable.  They give the game away, and then they sucker you into paying during gameplay, but they're not delivering on their end in terms of quality.  Avoid this game, and any other produced by Kongregate.

review:
I know this game is free to play but it's buggy as fuck.  You have to alt+f4 a lot to close the game bc the game just stops loading scripts.  Let's say you're in the main screen and want to play.... nothing you click on will activate so you have to close the game and reopen the game.

Is the gameplay itself fun?  Yes.  But it's very much a mobile game with pay to win aspects.  but there's a lot of funny cards and it's free, so yeah download it, play it, get a few giggles out of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100214945', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4950, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3307, 'last_played': 1641590597}
review: This game is hilarious and fun. I grew up with Futurama and King of the Hill, then as the other shows came out, I grew to love them all too. This game combines all your Animation Domination favorites into goofy cards, clever banter between characters, and an entertaining storyline. The research system is always a fun surprise. I give huge props to whoever captured some of the timeless moments from these shows, such as dodgeball Meg, CIA brainwashed Hailey, and Roger's closet. The guild events are super awesome, with tons of rewards and the pvp system is super chill, unlike most games these days. This is the perfect game to play if you just want to relax, unwind, or have a good laugh. Of course this is a card game, so if that isn't your thing, you might not be into this, unless you really enjoy the shows. Also...I always had a hunch that if Brian and Haley met, they'd hit it off. Thank you Animation Throwdown for confirming that for me xD Definitely recommend this game!! My only complaint is that there is no card for Cleveland in the bathtub. That's one of the most iconic gags ever!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198026229317', 'num_games_owned': 411, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1636079789}
review:
I would like to have enjoyed this game. I found it mindlessly and casually entertaining on my phone. Found it here on Steam. Played for about 5 or 10 minutes before I realized how poor of a port it was.
The UI just didn't seem to fit the keyboard, mouse and monitor setup. Something just seems off and I cannot pinpoint it. I have played other CCG/TCG on PC before. This just didn't feel right.
I came back to play it, made sure it was up to date and it gets stuck at 23% loading. I leave the room to wash a few dishes and come back to the game still at 23% 15 minutes later. I kill the process in task manager, verify file integrity, reboot my computer and verify once more. Still gets to 23%. Killed the process and uninstalled.

review: Играла еще сто лет назад в телефоне и тут...какой приятный сюрприз, оказывается она и в стиме сеть, да еще и синхронезировалась с моим прогрессом...какая прелесть)) я рада, что не пришлось страдать заново выбивая все легендарные карточки :)) отлично просто!

author: {'steamid': '76561198112513272', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1635930059}
review:
-Es un pay to win descarado donde si les da la gana te emparejan con gente que ya lo tiene todo para que pierdas y pagues.
-Cuando por fin te toca contra alguien de tu nivel al ser partidas de menos de un minuto y con un único tipo de carta (criaturas) todo lo que importa es a quien le sale la mejor mano inicial. Se siente más como un juego de azar que de cartas coleccionables.
-Todo lo que puedes hacer esta limitado por algún tipo de energía, ni siquiera hay una opción para jugar contra bots si te quieres sacar desafíos.¿Que no tienes suficientes cartas para hacer los desafios antes de quedarte sin energía? Haber pagado.
En resumen, un sacacuartos que va a por tu nostalgia para sacarte dinero y que no te des cuenta de lo que es en realidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198840090723', 'num_games_owned': 71, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 362, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1635600686}
review:
Sometime in the very near future, a woman on the London Underground coughs up blood and is quietly rushed to a facility its employees refer to simply as The Complex. Her body has been invaded by nanocells, an advanced technology with the potential to revolutionise medical science, if only its creators—including our protagonist, Dr. Amy Tenant—could sort out that whole coughing up blood thing.

Four years ago, Tenant worked as a warzone medic in a fictional totalitarian state called Kindar. With talk of a supreme leader and references to human rights violations, it's not difficult to identify which country inspired the game's writer, Lynn Renee Maxcy, who was part of the writing team for Emmy-winning TV series The Handmaid's Tale.

Now Tenant is with Kensington Corp, a British biotech company who has hired interns from war-torn Kindar to help with the nanocell project—one of which we learn was the blood-spewing girl on the tube. Figuring out why this happened, and how the nanocells escaped the lab, is the first mystery you have to solve as Tenant, a suspiciously young Canadian scientist. But the story soon grows more, well, complex.

review: It's a competitive card game with its own set of rules which can be complex. Like any competitive card game (e.g. Magic the Gathering, Pokemon, etc) there's a learning curve. Pay to win is definitely addictive and can get you in trouble, especially if you get involved with some of the more competitive guilds. That said, you CAN build a good deck completely free, it just takes a LONG time, like on the order of years not days.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044549550', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2750, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 184, 'last_played': 1640351871}
review: awesome card game, once you catch on to how some of the strategies play out, and how to customize your decks, it's a serious challenge. there's no real straight forward instructions, but is intuitive enough to get started, and learn from trial and error. The most effective way, obviously, is to research on your own. It could use a lot of little improvements to make the port from Android app to PC far more functions e.g.-ability to use the mouse wheel. It's not far from one of the best card games I've played. I played it from release in 2015 or 16, then stopped after about 2 years, and just picked it up again now that it's on Steam..can also be played thru their website, or EPIC. Summing it up, this game is fun af, lol, and it's important to get with a tight clan that communicates, there's tons of events daily, and tbh, you can leave it, and pick it right back up any time you want...altho kind of a dick move to your teammates lol.

author: {'steamid': '76561198366525271', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 5344, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4051, 'last_played': 1679848735}
review:
I found this game while being bored and having no expectations. I'm a casual gamer keep that in mind. I find the initial gameplay fun, and soon became addicted. However I did lose my account progress but a week later and some help from support got me my progress back. And since then I've been playing casually every day for the last 2-3 months. I have a full deck of legendary cards fully upgraded. And I win PVP about 70-80% of the time. I have not put any money at all into this game either.

In terms of late game, yes it does get repetitive and boring sometimes, and there is a button that can auto play for you if you can't be bothered. The game itself when you have a strong deck is shallow, most of the fun is about building your ultimate deck and going through the struggles along the way, but once that is overcome its just rinse and repeat gameplay. I hope devs add more modes and challenges. I can understand why people dislike this game with the "P2W" aspects like packs and timers and energy. Though if you're the type of person who isn't after burning through all the content in 1 day then I say give it a try.

My main concern are updates and content. I'm be finishing the main story soon, and then the only thing left for me will be PVP which I don't really enjoy to much. I hope the devs add more cards, new modes, a new campaign maybe. And just more stuff to do in the game. Also I hope they listen to suggestions and fix the bugs and glitches people have with the game.

So I recommend this game if you are a non competitive person, a casual gamer and just looking for some time to kill, its addictive and over time you can build a strong deck if you're consistent and patient. But don't expect there to be any real end game. What you see is what you get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198020807252', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 589, 'last_played': 1636596520}
review:
Out of all the Pay 2 Play games I have ever played on the phone or PC, this one gives you the most useful free things. I mean, is it Pay 2 Play? I am sure at some point it is. Does this game actually reward you for playing instead of making you pay for everything? Yes, and I can't think of any other free games that give you as much as this one does.

Update: Didn't spend a time, 100% achievements.

review:
The devs of this game remind me of some sort of mainstream people who has to make some copypaste to the market to keep up with others in the competition to get those p2w elephants out there (and there are a lot of them!). 

However, I have enjoyed the concept of this game and its character (which the devs have not made up...as we know). 

It's worth a try, but if you are not a p2w elephant who enjoys to show off in a never evolving game, stay away. 

I have had my share of enjoyment and will now delete this from my library and ignore it.

Sobald man die Schlägerei/Siege freischaltet, hat man nur eine 5% Gewinnchance, aber auch nur wenn man selbst schon Legendäre karten hat.

review: This game is very fun to play , its probably my first card game ever , the main problem with this game is its huge p2w , probably thats the business model for card games idk , since its f2p it can be understandable as they need to make money obviously but it reminds me of mobile games for some reason, you don't have to pay to have fun I think but on the other hand you cant win against someone who is spending $$$ , also one weird problem is your playtime is limited and you have to refill energy for some ingame currency, I enjoy the game but I know for sure I will drop it and forget about it soon since the game itself is pushing me out, big mistake in my opinion

review: Außer Die Simpson ist alles dabei (American Dad, Futurama, Family Guy, Bob´s Burger und King of The Hill)! Es ist ein karten spiel was Spaß macht! Am besten probiert ihr es selbst aus es ist ja Gratis ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198129988390', 'num_games_owned': 1184, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 831, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 619, 'last_played': 1699598488}
review:
Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards превращает ваших любимых анимированных персонажей в карточную игру для мобильной платформы. С сотнями персонажей и всеми ссылками на телешоу, которые можно ожидать увидеть в сочетании с простым, чтобы понять игровой процесс.

Показ Гриффинов, Футурамы, Американского папаши, Царя горы и Бургеры Боба Animation Throwdown имитирует формулу похожих бесплатных игр. Выбирая своего персонажа из этих анимированных миров, игроки могут играть за:

- Боба;
- Роджера;
- Брайана;
- Лилу;
- Бобби

Как и ваш персонаж, эти карты объединяют 5 вселенных вместе с такими картами, как Лоис, Куагмаер и Крис, в колоде Гриффинов. В то время как ваша колода Футурамы заполнена Фраем, Лилой и остальной командой. Всего в каждой вселенной есть 7 персонажей с разными навыками и характеристиками.

Геймплейный бой имеет простую конструкцию: игроки тянут одну карту из своей колоды (минимум 25) каждый ход и разыгрывают одну из карт из своей руки (создается путем вытягивания 5 карт в начале игры). Основными характеристиками указанных карт являются атака и здоровье, когда здоровье карты достигнет 0, оно будет удалено с игрового поля.

Играемые карты будут атаковать их прямо противоположную карту, а оставшийся урон будет нанесен игроку. Как только здоровье персонажа опускается до нуля, игра выигрывается. В то время как формула напоминает бесчисленное множество других игр, основная стратегия и долговечность Throwdown Animation: The Quest for Cards заключается в исследовании карт и комбинациях, в которых две карты объединены в один более сильный вариант.

За то, что игре не хватает глубины, это компенсируется юмором и чрезвычайно длительной кампанией. Фанат любой из 5 телевизионных вселенных также получит дополнительное удовольствие от предлагаемой игры.

Подведём итоги обзора игры Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards
- Объединяет анимированные миры 5 любимых телепередач.
- Соберите уникальную колоду персонажей и предметов.
- Исследуйте новые мощные комбинации.
- Режим длительной кампании в дополнение к PvP.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285707134', 'num_games_owned': 3890, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 6212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1145, 'last_played': 1678598990}
review:
English:
I had a problem with the game and ended up uninstalling to never go back to it. The problem is as follows. Inside the game you'll find quests that'll earn you points. Among those quests, there is one you should be wary about and that is to log onto a K-whatever website. Do not do it. If you value your account and have already been playing for a while, do not do it. I went to the website so that I could claim 50 points or so and ended up losing my account. As for the game, it is fun and it is free so you may want to give it a try. Minor inconvenience is they put you up against players who literally pay to win the game, which is no longer fun. That aside, if not for the fact that they lost my account, because that's what they did and now every time I start the game the new account shows up and there is no log out or change account button, I know I would be playing the game for at least a 100 hours I can tell you that's how addictive it is.  I played for 20 hours in just five days so now you know what you are getting yourself into. However, due to the problem i mentioned before I have chosen not to play the game anymore. I am not willing to put up with such  crap. 

Español:
Tuve un problema con el juego y terminé desinstalando y no volveré a jugarlo. El problema fue el siguiente. Dentro del juego habrá misiones que puedes hacer para ganar puntos adicionales. Entre esas misiones existe una con la que debes tener cuidado y es la de registrarse o conectarse en su sitio web oficial que es K-algo. No lo hagas. Si valoras tu cuenta y ya has invertido algo de tiempo en ella, no lo hagas. Yo entré a su sitio web para poder reclamar esos 50 puntos y terminé perdiendo mi cuenta. En cuanto al juego, es divertido y es gratis, bien puedes darle la oportunidad. Un pequeño inconveniente es que te ponen contra personas que literalmente pagan para ganar, lo que le quita lo divertido. Eso a un lado, si no fuera por que perdieron mi cuenta, porque eso fue lo que hicieron y ahora cada que inicio el juego una cuenta nueva es la que aparece, seguiría jugando por al menos unas 100 horas. Así de adictivo es el juego. Jugué 20 horas en 5 días entonces ya saben a lo que le entran. Sin embargo, debido al problema que ya mencioné he decidido no volver a jugar este juego. No voy a soportar estas estupideces.

review:
Игра выезжает на фирменном юморе и известных персонажах Мэтта Гроунинга. В остальном же это незатейливая коллекционка, страдающая от искусственно растянутой системы прогресса («донать или развивайся медленно») и неглубокого геймплея (в основном побеждает тот, у кого сильнее карты или лучше связки). А после обнаружения функции автобоя игра вообще сводится к менеджменту ресурсов.

Могу посоветовать разве что казуалам и фанатам Гроунинга.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121169727', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 1031, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1031, 'last_played': 1638042563}
review:
➥ Я играю в эту карточную игру несколько дней, основанную на известных мультсериалах от FOX, таких как Family Guy или Futurama, и могу сказать, что она меня навсегда удивила. Кроме того, бесплатная базовая игра предлагает часы веселья и, прежде всего, развлечений. Он также содержит несколько DLC (теперь есть пакет со скидкой на 10 евро) и в качестве хорошего «Pay to Win», если вы хотите добиться большого прогресса, вам придется подготовить портфолио, чтобы получить лучшие карты.

➥Если вы хотите время от времени уделять немного времени, игра предлагает вам несколько режимов игры; приключения, арена, турниры, ежедневные квесты, даже вступление в кланы. Помимо большой коллекции карт. В каждую выигранную игру вы будете добавлять монеты, которые будут использоваться для покупки новых наборов и увеличения коллекции.

➥ Геймплей прост, игры 1 против 1, пока вы не исчерпаете свою энергию, вы должны ждать. Вы начинаете с базовой колоды, хотя вскоре вы получите новые карты, уровень которых можно будет повышать, исследовать слияния с ними и переработать их, если вам это не интересно. Улучшения карт используются, чтобы вы могли выполнять в игре более мощные комбинации и комбинации.

➥ Довольно забавная игра, в которой вы будете смеяться над названиями некоторых слияний и, без сомнения, рекомендуемую, более бесплатную. Что если, останется, что Симпсоны отсутствуют 4/10.

➥ хотя я играю в течение короткого времени, я предлагаю вам несколько рекомендаций, которые помогут вам быстро продвинуться; не накапливайте много денег, тратьте, когда можете, в пачках по 5000, если мы сосредоточимся на режиме приключений, мы получим ценные карты раньше, всегда пытайтесь исследовать карты, помните время слияния и особенно не лучшие карты сумасшедшим способом, фрагменты они в конечном итоге окажутся в дефиците.

review: Great card game, it has some issues with steam on occasion but it is a blast to play. This is a mobile game - so micro transactions are part of it, and the top guilds and players spend thousands a month on it - but you don't have to spend a penny and you can do pretty well for yourself if you put in a bit of time and energy, lots of free to play players in the top 100 guilds where there is lots of strategy and good groups of people to connect with (usually via Line)

author: {'steamid': '76561199077600042', 'num_games_owned': 217, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 345, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 321, 'last_played': 1622948730}
review: Once in a lifetime you'll come across a work of fiction that truly captures the history and cultural distinctions of the modern world the way a person can subjectively perceive it through our guided field of perspective. I have to admit, I had my doubts when I first learned of the game. After all, Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards? Will this game even be good? How ignorant was I to even have these thoughts. Little did I know I was about to indulge in what may have been the best game of my life. The game started out strong. The opening scenes enticed the audience with a captivating story and peter griffin fart funnies. I was so taken aback from the next-generation animation that I almost didn't even realize the underlying symbolism in the ongoing scenes. It wasn't until my twenty sixth playthrough of the game where I finally got my bearings together and was able to focus on the gripping and labyrinthine stratagem. The underlying analogy for 19th century distopianism and the evangelical deviation of typical orthodoxy was enlightening to say the least. Just when I thought the movie could not get any better, the increasing conflict before the climax began. I could not believe the complexity of the story as the main protagonist, Peter Griffin, struggled with the endeavors for a quintessential beer company worker such as the consistent up- hill altercation of the fight against misogyny and the fiscal synergy of opposing interplanetary dynamisms. There I was, gripping to my chair as the conflict of the game began. I was so enticed by the movie that I felt as if I was both practically and relatively apart of the game. This is a special kind of high that not even the strongest of drugs can give you. Was I part of the story? Am I inside the game right now? This game will leave you questioning existential nihilism and the objective skepticism of our perceived valuation of anthropological existence. At this point in the film, I was fully intoxicated by the early 2000s animated art style. That's when the plot finally aggrandized and I was completely stupefied. You could have lived a thousand years of isolation trying to predict the plot twist and you would never even scratch the surface of what actually transpires in the game. I was so bewildered that I actually had to pause the movie so that my existential crisis didn't dive too deep inside of myself. Even pausing the game was surreal. It's almost as if life paused with the game. I felt as though I had actually become a technological tangent quantum. The effects are still wearing off and I haven't been able to play another game in several years. I spent the following seven years afraid of what outside of my house actually looks like. Every single day and night I live in misery because I became fully aware that happiness is never achievable. I realized that human life has absolutely no meaning and that no matter what I ever do, it is of complete unimportance and in years from now, no recollection of my existence will prevail, meaning that if I died years ago, died now, or die sometime in the future it will not matter whatsoever to anyone. But, then again, the fact that I'm living doesn't matter either so I might as well stick around for awhile, living in complete isolation, condemned to a life of traumatic memories and a completely corrupted sub-conscience. This game isn't a game, its a lifestyle 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197975632889', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 874, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 332, 'last_played': 1624172023}
review:
Animation Throwdown.
Ein Kartendeck-Spiel ähnlich zu 'Magic the gathering', aber viel, viel zugänglicher. 
So zugänglich, dass es mir wie ein Clicker-Spiel vorkommt :)
Das muss man mögen, ebenso hilft es die vier . In den ersten Spielen kann man kaum verlieren, dagegen kann man bei Digimon und Magic von der ersten Runde an immer verlieren, man lernt erst durch die Niederlagen, wie man die Karten kombiniert.

Die Tutorials sind einfach und mit jedem Spiel lernt man das Kombinieren der Karten besser. Mit Erfahrungspunkten kann man die Karten aufwerten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198261685733', 'num_games_owned': 2637, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 2881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 752, 'last_played': 1656427927}
review:
I really am enjoying this game,

i played it a bit a few years back and recently went back to the game and found it to still be fun - i like the shows it features like family guy, futurama and american dad - not too hot on bob's burgers and king of the hill

I really like the fact it has nods to real episodes from the series as well such as mcstroke (family guy) and i really love how simple it is to play - no complicated rule set like many other card games

The best part for me is making the combinations between cards and seeing what they come out as is always a good laugh 

i love that it has a good single player mode and plenty for online as well as challenges

The one down side is - that i wish it would or could add more shows into the cards/game like the simpsons or Rick and Morty - otherwise i think it is a good games - 7.5/10

edit: since i made this review they had a problem with being able to play the game but has since been fixed and although some say they had to start back at level 1 - i did not so cannot comment on this

author: {'steamid': '76561198082185766', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 3435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1587, 'last_played': 1658694236}
review:
Fun time waster, nothing that's going to make you think super strategically. Also shouldn't make this your main game since it uses the timed stamina mechanic common to mobile games (this is a port of a mobile game after all). Can be a fun/funny way to spend 30-60 minutes every day or 3. I've spent exactly $0.00 on this and have a near full deck of purples and blues. It can be kind of grind-y like this but c'mon it's a virtual TCG. As far as I'm aware the "PVP" is just AI controlling other player's decks. but tbh that's better than real PVP imo. Has many cheeky nods to the shows represented. Any complaints about P2W, baffle me, Daily logins and special events practically hemmorage gems and other premium currency and the story mode rematches are great ways of getting blues. Ntm that the arena and challenge maps are ranked so the difficulty of your opponents tend to scale well to your deck.

tl;dr, good but nothing special.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064051118', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1495, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1622858944}
review: Encontrei esse jogo por acaso enquanto navegava por perfis aleatórios da Steam, me chamou a atenção principalmente pela quantidade de horas que a pessoa tinha nesse jogo. Comecei a jogar como quem não quer nada, e mesmo nunca tendo assistido nenhum dos seriados acabei me viciando MUITO rápido. As combinações de cartas são muito divertidas, os inúmeros combos possíveis de se fazer só acaba nos fazendo ficar mais interessados. A jogatina é bem simples, dá pra jogar por horas. O único ponto negativo é que dependemos de "energia" para avançar na campanha, então quando acaba, precisa esperar um tempo para recarregar ou gastar muitas daquelas pedras.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198017457886', 'num_games_owned': 225, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 1365, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1654359731}
review:
Me : Played for a few years on mobile. Spent +- $ / € 6 after 2-3 years.

99.9% Pay to win with a game me chanic around.
And you have to pay A LOT for a slight chance to get something barely worthy.
Walls everywhere, advertisements (20-30 seconds each) to get a minimal boost (barely worth anything)
It will take you YEARS ! (i mean it) to get a few mythics (yellow) 

It is not a "i'll play 5 min a day" casual game (it is better now with auto battles, otherwise, spend an hour for barely anything worthy)

There is indeed some pleasure sometimes, at the beginning "IT is shiny, it is nice, it is new" After that, it is a waste or braincells, time and, if you do, money.

Pros (yup, there are some) 
-the cards graphics are nice.
-If you enjoyed the cartoons, you will see characters from the cartoons... (is that a Pro ?)
-You can play on multiple platforms including computer so you can see it on a big screen.

If you want to spend hours/days/years of frustration and temptation, and at least spend $ € 10 000, this game is for you.

RUN. AWAY. FROM. IT. 
DO NOT EVEN GIVE IT TO CHILDREN. Everything is more or less harrassment.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1617032633}
review:
This is a freemium mobile ported cardgame deckbuilder with cartoon characters from shows like Family Guy, Bobs Burgers and Futurama.

Being mobile ported, the game lacks the required customisation and tweaking options needed for a PC game.  Also, the game is heavily P2W and time gated, like all greedy mobile scam games tend to be. 

It's a shame to see beloved TV cartoon characters being dragged through the mud with this mobile garbage.  Play Hearthstone or MTG instead, or any other better, non-toxic non-mobile orientated game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198143383928', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 10958, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1689611237}
review:
LOVE this game & all the animated shows featured in the game. My husband downloaded it first, then shared the game with my 11 yr old daughter and myself. We've all been hooked since the first day and now play it as a family. The game is pretty easy to catch on to, each character's script and the image on their card itself brings back memories of all the many episodes you've seen as you've followed each show from their pilots to current. You really will chuckle when you see some of these cards.

As far as pay to play, if you're patient you will eventually get the high end cards but it will take a long time for cards like the mythics. There are different challenges, aka events, every three to four days and you can participate in group events with your guild such as the siege. Personally, I do enjoy the siege but the arena is where I like to play as soon as I get on. When you score high enough, you can make it to the fight club in the arena, at least that's what I call it. It's almost like a stage two in the arena and I have personally found out, it can be hard. It's as if the game intentionally pairs you with an unbeatable opponent simply because you are on a win streak, which is a pain sometimes.

All in all, you should give it a try if you are into adult animation and card games.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010795111', 'num_games_owned': 398, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 9282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 412, 'last_played': 1624401465}
review:
Otro [b]juego de cartas de estrategia gratis[/b], pero esta vez con personajes de [b][i]"Futurama"[/i][/b], [b][i]"Padre de familia"[/i][/b], [b][i]"El rey de la colina"[/i][/b], [b][i]"American Dad"[/i][/b] y [b][i]"Bob's Burgers"[/i][/b].
Su mecánica es similar a los otros juegos del estilo, tanto en las partidas como en el [i]grind[/i] y modos de juego, pero no por eso es menos divertido. Las cartas pueden combinarse para transformarse en otras más poderosas y las partidas son muy rápidas ya que no son presenciales. 
Vale la pena probarlo, especialmente si te gustan esas series y esos juegos.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999111677', 'num_games_owned': 950, 'num_reviews': 116, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1494308473}
review:
Played this a ton on mobile.

Don't recommend because it is advertised as a PvP game, but you only play against AI-controlled versions of other peoples decks.

The Pay2Win elements could be fine if there was real competition, but instead it's just people paying to beat bots, and you will never win unless you pay as much as the other players.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013135781', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 30843, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 288, 'last_played': 1676433014}
review:
DO NOT BUY - PTW $$$ SCAM.

Let me start off by saying this game is a good game if the developers were not so GREEDY. Charge $30-$40 for the entire game and be able to earn and win every match and card and it is worth it. I have played games like this before - cost me a lot of money - and then the developers DISAPPEAR AND RUN WITH YOUR $$$.

Negatives in addition to $$$:

The free amount lasts only a few hours; you literally have to wait hours for improvements to be researched - to earn back a chance to battle other players AND to even just continue the regular campaign mode. This is greed at the highest. 

*Please search - so many other deck building games that have better mechanics, are more fun to play, and you can purchase the entire game for a set price.

***Due to the insane amount of greed - I am boycotting all games by this developer and publisher. (So many seem to be free...they must think we are dumb.)

author: {'steamid': '76561198025630223', 'num_games_owned': 3301, 'num_reviews': 297, 'playtime_forever': 1918, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1918, 'last_played': 1613880021}
review:
Like most of Kongregate's mobile games and PC ports, this is egregious pay-to-win trash.  It's great for the first ten hours or so, then you start to get funneled towards paying for [b]everything[/b]—energy, materials to upgrade, cards—every possible, exploitable thing.  PVP matchmaking goes from a decent challenge until about Rank 7 when the game "miraculously" starts throwing whales at you that decimate you in seconds with their decks of maxed out legendary cards.  Did I mention you only get one point for a PVP win, but [b]lose three points[/b] for a loss?  

Complete time-wasting, extremely greedy garbage.

[h1]2/10[/h1]

review:
[h1] One of the sadest and most brazen Cash Grab Attemepts ever  ![/h1]

[u] Gameplay [/u] is not the worst. It´s basically a collectible card game. An not the worst at it.
But the whole thing is set up like a [u]mobile game[/u].
Every action requires some sort of points, which recharge at a fking slow rate so u are kinda forced to pay real money, just to keep playin that junk...

So: [u][b] PAY - TO - WIN / Don´t support this thing by playin it! [/b][/u]

Even Family Guy and American Dad can´t compensate that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083628219', 'num_games_owned': 1024, 'num_reviews': 49, 'playtime_forever': 794, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1613336786}
review:
Single player campaign is kind of fun, but otherwise you're going to get unfairly matched against people who have spent a lot of time and money to get and upgrade ridiculously powerful cards and heroes.

Purchasable card packs have pretty bad odds of getting good cards, earnable packs have even worse odds.

There's also features in the Steam version that are either completely missing (increased odds at hero tokens from arena battles, reduced research time, and extra coins from the single player campaign) or locked behind a paywall (3rd research chamber) that are present in the mobile version for watching a couple 30 second ads.

review: It's not awful, but, it's still a port of a phone game. Good for killing a few minutes, but, that's  what phone games are for,

review: This game has so much potential to be a very fun and exciting game.  But this game was waaaaay too rushed and only had a goal of making money in mind.  This was made extremely poor.  Absolutely terrible Game Mechanics and almost blindly playing.  It's got very random and complicated game play and almost IMPOSSIBLE unless you dish out real money and lots of it to be even be sub par.  The game will require you to spend money very fast.  It's very fun to collect these cards, but it's an absolute waste of time and money.  Don't bother getting hooked on, it's got absolutely terrible UI interface and zero options for anything.  Can't Guild chat through game, they just took out Windows Mode.  Everything is just very horrible'.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057591983', 'num_games_owned': 2752, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 1209, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1090, 'last_played': 1612240967}
review:
Игровой процесс 5/10
Графика 5/10
Музыка 5/10

+Ачивки +Футурама -Карточки -Донат -Ограничения

Итог 5/10 Хороший ККИ для новичков или лентяев. )

Простой ККИ, но при этом увлекательный. Если вы только познаете ККИ то вам стоит начать с этой игры. Да и где вы еще увидите футураму, грифинов и другие интересные мульты в игре. Но есть одна большая проблема, это злой донат! Если по началу это не заметно то чем дальше тем больнее. Плюс ограничения на кол-во действий в час, что на мой взгляд уже перебор. Но не смотря на все трудности игра мне понравилась, поэтому и вам советую!

author: {'steamid': '76561198131213014', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 8055, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 718, 'last_played': 1636581223}
review:
Игра хорошая понравилась,карты,прокачка процесс НО!!!
Нормально,полноценно в неё не поиграть, т.к. заканчиваются ходы и нужны алмазы которые стоят реальных денег и не малых.
Вывод; Всё крутится вплотную с алмазами а это ''донат'' что один единственный в магазине игры в итоге интерес пропадает в связи с коротким игровым процессом в отсутствии ходов которые рассчитаны на весь игровой процесс.Притом баланс противников издевательский и до кучи к этому нельзя влиять на карты игрового процесса,какие игра посчитает нужным,да такие и раздаст.Понятно почему игра не так уж и популярна,постоянный развод на деньги очень уж утомляет регулярное присутствие нае@б@лова напрягает жёстко и что бы понять это надо поиграть и разочароваться.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993815346', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 7549, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 182, 'last_played': 1615779515}
review:
Heute geholt und zack 3 Stunden auf dem Konto. :D

Das Spiel macht Spaß und hat für Nerds auch ein paar unterhaltsame Sprüche und Kombos auf Lager.
Für ein kostenloses Spiel gibt es da absolut nichts zu meckern meiner Meinung nach.

Natürlich kann man mit Echtgeld nachhelfen - was sicherlich auch gewünscht ist - aber man muss nicht.
Das liegt bei einem jeden selbst.

Auch ist es vielleicht besser, wenn man nicht mit Echtgeld nachhilft wegen dem Suchtfaktor.
Denn man kann ein bestimmtes Limit spielen, bis die Energie aufgebraucht ist. 
Danach muss man änliche wie bei Handy-App-Games warten, bis es regeneriert - also eine Pause einlegen, wenn man beim Gratis-Gaming bleiben will. 
Für mich vollkommen ok. 

Für zwischendrin ist es einfach nett und unterhaltsam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040445146', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 8746, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5396, 'last_played': 1652914321}
review: The game is quite fun, but the amount of money needed for the end game is crazy. You do not get much in return for your money and its not worth trying unless you have plenty of extra money with nothing to spend it on. The cards are fun to see and finding new combo's is really fun, but it takes 24 hours for each combo. Its totally possible to play the game for quite some time without putting money into it. I suggest checking it out and enjoying the free aspects of the game, then stop playing once you hit a wall, as putting money into it is just a waste.

review: I disagree with those that say you need to pay to get anything out of this game. Of course if you play for an hour or so at a time eventually you will need to pay to continue but if you leave and go back after a few hours or a day or two as a casual player it's not a problem. I play because I like Family Guy and American Dad and i like to see what combos you can create. It passes time nicely and whilst it's not really for serious gamers it's still entertaining.

author: {'steamid': '76561198343522591', 'num_games_owned': 865, 'num_reviews': 185, 'playtime_forever': 10626, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1465, 'last_played': 1677947364}
review:
看商店页面的时候就觉得似曾相识。
果然呢，是外服的手游。
屁颠屁颠我又跑去港服苹果商店下载了一个。
我还是留着手机玩吧，不知道为什么感觉电脑的画面会卡卡的。难道是因为网络问题吗？
好了，撇开以上这些。
画风大爱，虽然没看过动画片，但感觉这个画面很舒服，而且很多卡片的图案非常的滑稽有趣。
相比日漫风来说。画风新奇。
不会千篇一律，而且审美疲劳。
中规中矩的卡片游戏，可以等待时间时长合成强力卡片，看上去还是比较良心的。
不同卡片组合之间能够变换成新的卡片，这个功能特别的有趣，我非常的喜欢。
可能这个游戏比较久了吧。我进去了一回居然在活动前50还是我英文不过关，理解错误？
真怕有一天会鬼服呀。
不过那也不是咱能决定的事情，能晚一天是一天，毕竟画风在浙里办却在这里，应该不会鬼吧！
再说咱也就来体验体验，您决定氪金吗？
反正我是很心动，
忍忍吧，忍忍吧，毕竟免费游戏喜加一。
可以联动K账号，手机电脑数据同步呢。
祝大家游戏愉快！

author: {'steamid': '76561198229930204', 'num_games_owned': 175, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 3425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 398, 'last_played': 1617445507}
review:
Alright. Wanna play a game that's simple card game that just "Who has the best deck and combinations?". Well this is for you featuring all the funny or memorable characters in some overrated and underrated adult cartoons that aired on the 90's?

This is kind of is for you. 

Like I've been playing this like a lot of years already and I loved it as hell because I get to see my favorite adult cartoon character moments in one card. 

Pros :
>simple game with simple combinations
>good time waster and casual feel
>features Futurama and King of the Hill
>lets you grind for the stuff you might or not like
>can get free stuff just by participating events
>Ads to speed up stuff or open stuff 

Cons :
>The "Pay To Get What You Might Not Or Might Want" aspect
>[b]Family Guy[/b]
>This game is not for patient people
>Recharging sometimes sucks together with the researching
>VIP system 

All in all. It's sorta good that this game let's you kind of... [b] Grind for all of it. [/b]

[spoiler] If you just see me with lower hours here on Steam I just recently started playing here. I've played this game on android for nearly just 3 years but my phone was old and broken so I just migrated here to playing it here just now. [/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198442217100', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 70865, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61835, 'last_played': 1622929101}
review:
I do recommend this game, it has grown to be a solid game but great it is not. I was so excited about its potential at launch that I had everyone in my house download it. Once guilds were open I created one and was playing it daily, until that pay to win wall hit (which all games have) and it became next to impossible to get pass the later stages. Dont get me wrong, there was/is A LOT of game before that wall. 

After a few months, tried again and not much had changed :/  Then tried again a few months ago and it finally had some balance between pay to win and not spending a cent and being competitive. I can now win decently without spending, amazingly still using some of the cards I had which were over 2 years old too BUT this next part is what stops it from being great.

In the arena, once you get so high, you are almost always overmatched and I dont mean like your 'character' is a few pts under your opponent, its usually they double yours like 44 vs 96 and its TOO hard to level up your characters as it is mostly random NOT total games played. I use Roger and I have won 2 games and got +4 (of the 90 I need to level up 1 tier) and then played 20 games and not a single + towards him.

I do have to say they have done a great job of balancing most of the attributes cards can have.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144445264', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 2551, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2474, 'last_played': 1686479816}
review:
Ich habe dieses Spiel bereits auch aus dem PlayStore runtergeladen, da ich wie in eine Sucht verfallen bin, die aber nur 3-4Wochen anhielt. Ich bin sowieso ein komischer Mensch was das durchspielen von Games angeht.

Hier hat man natürlich jede Menge Aufgaben zu erledigen, von monatlich oder wöchentlichen Events bis hinzu Clan-Sieges und einen Storymode/ eine Map mit diversen Leveln die man von einem Stern auf eine Stufe nach Gold meistern kann.

An sich ein gutes Spiel, was sehr Hearthstone ähnelt, aber für mich zu eintönig auf dauer.

Man hat natürlich immer wieder mal den Drang weiterzuspielen ;) [ Bei mir sinds bereit 2-3Jahre :) ]

author: {'steamid': '76561198203596849', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 215, 'playtime_forever': 3462, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3462, 'last_played': 1610556508}
review:
( Данный обзор может содержать спойлеры и ненармотивную лексику , если тебе это не по душе , то иди в ж*пу и листай дальше.)
 Карточные игры можно отнести к отдельному виду искусства.
 Смысл в чем: профессор Фарнсворт создал очередную машину и произошла авария, благодаря чему и объединились разные миры мультяшных вселенных, которые крутили по 2х2.
 Механика игры состоит из слияния карт, а именно карт персонажей и карт предметов или мест, и получаем событие. У каждой карты есть свои плюсы и минусы. Чем быстрее нае*ашишь противника, тем быстрее победа. 
 Дро*ильней я это назвать не могу, хочешь донатить - донать. На двадцатом часу игры у меня уже штук десять легендарок было.
 Минусы этой игры - со временем надоедает и заставляет заскучать и нет фирменных шуток в диалогах.
 Оценка: 6/10.
 Иииииииииииииииииииииииииииииииииииии помните, "Каменьсердце" скатился.

Однако вместе с её отсутствием пропали также плюшки от просмотра рекламы, например вторая исследовательская будка, бонусы за 3 просмотренные в ряд рекламы и тд.

author: {'steamid': '76561198329483975', 'num_games_owned': 41, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 1648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 542, 'last_played': 1632872796}
review: Overall, it's a pretty good game to pass time and have fun mixing and matching. Although a bit confusing on how hits are truly scored it still grants some excitement because you don't really know how things will turn out on each draw. Biggest draw back is the arena I would say. Once you get a 6-7 win streak, you'll be matched against players who either have put in days more time than you or they simply just put more money in. Either way, the matches become extremely one-sided and your streak will most likely rarely see 8-10. Otherwise, like I said, there's plenty to do with events and the campaign/story. I would probably rate the game a true 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198858453531', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 3204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3120, 'last_played': 1612526777}
review:
Better than hearthstone, atleast.
Yeah, I said it.
The game's not got much going for it in terms of high end graphics or complicated gameplay, and there is <sigh> ANOTHER crystal-based real-money system, but it's alright if your a fan of any of the 5 shows in it.
The lack of complexity means you can jump in, have a couple of games and be done if you find yourself needing to fill  10 mins.
The artwork is on point when it comes to their source material, but then they're 2d cartoons so I'd expect as much.
I feel like the could have gone a little further with the sound, as there's no voice acting that made the cartoons so good - I guess that would have eaten into their profit margins too much - as it would have been nice to hear Fry or Brian (for example) say something when you played their cards, but nope.

SO yeah, a passable time filler if you need one, even if it does feel like a bit of a wasted opportunity.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079270356', 'num_games_owned': 530, 'num_reviews': 106, 'playtime_forever': 21885, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21837, 'last_played': 1609944520}
review:
Už to bude nějaký čas, co mě bavilo Yu-Gi-Oh! a pak jsem na karetní hry na pár let zanevřela. Než mě nějakým způsobem chytilo Animation Throwdown.

Takže, Animation Throwdown. Původně stažené ze zvědavosti, protože seriály jako Futurama, Family Guy, King of the Hill a tak dál většina z nás zná, viděla je nebo je zná alespoň od vidění. Dej bože i z memes. A nápad postavit proti sobě jejich charaktery se mi moc líbil. Nakonec jsem spadla do králičí nory o více jak 300 hodinách hraní, ze které se ale teď spíše stalo fast forwarding duelů a čekání na různé odměny než opravdovém hraní.

Animation Throwdown vás jako každá jiná karetní / strategická hra provede základy a pak vás nechá, abyste si sami oťukali, co se kde dá udělat, upgradovat, dostat zdarma, kdy a jak, kdo vám nakope zadek a co musíte udělat pro to, aby se to nestalo podruhé. Hráč začíná s těmi nejvíce obyčejnými kartami a postupně si vypracovává balíček dle vlastních představ a možností. Vše, co hráč získá ve hře (ať už hraje proti počítači nebo za tým, plněním týdenních úkolů nebo questů) se dá směnit, karty recyklovat, za zlatá hovna a diamanty se dá leccos nakoupit. Člověk si dost vyhraje s kombinováním karet, různými sezónními upgrady hrdinů, odměnami od devů, když náhodou něco nejde...

Problém téhle hry je, když se člověk dostane do fáze, kdy mu padají stále ty samé karty, na objevení nové kombinace karet musí čekat i 4 dny a dohraje adventure mode až do poslední 33. kapitoly. Hra začne stagnovat a dost se opakovat. Což neznamená, že by mě poté už nebavila, ale mé denní návštěvy vypadají tak, že si nechám automaticky odehrát duely, questy, posbírám odměny, podívám se, zda už doběhlo kombinování karet a tím to pro mě končí. Jde o takovou rutinu. Dalším problémem jsou mikro transakce. Dá se bez nich v pohodě obejít, ale limitované edice karet a jiné speciály si jinak než za pravé peníze prostě nekoupíte. Animation Throwdown si také nezahrajete, pokud nejste připojení k internetu.

Suma sumárum bych AT spíše doporučila pro telefon, než PC, ale protože nejsem na mobilní hry, skončila jsem u PC verze a předstírat, že mě nebavila, by byla lež jak Brno. Každopádně obě verze jsou free to play, takže jediné, co musíte obětovat je pár mb místa na disku a chuť hru vyzkoušet a udělat si vlastní obrázek. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198288058950', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2721, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1710874441}
review:
➥ Я играю в эту карточную игру несколько дней, основанную на известных мультсериалах от FOX, таких как Family Guy или Futurama, и могу сказать, что она меня навсегда удивила. Кроме того, бесплатная базовая игра предлагает часы веселья и, прежде всего, развлечений. Он также содержит несколько DLC (теперь есть пакет со скидкой на 10 евро) и в качестве хорошего «Pay to Win», если вы хотите добиться большого прогресса, вам придется подготовить портфолио, чтобы получить лучшие карты.

➥Если вы хотите время от времени уделять немного времени, игра предлагает вам несколько режимов игры; приключения, арена, турниры, ежедневные квесты, даже вступление в кланы. Помимо большой коллекции карт. В каждую выигранную игру вы будете добавлять монеты, которые будут использоваться для покупки новых наборов и увеличения коллекции.

➥ Геймплей прост, игры 1 против 1, пока вы не исчерпаете свою энергию, вы должны ждать. Вы начинаете с базовой колоды, хотя вскоре вы получите новые карты, уровень которых можно будет повышать, исследовать слияния с ними и переработать их, если вам это не интересно. Улучшения карт используются, чтобы вы могли выполнять в игре более мощные комбинации и комбинации.

➥ Довольно забавная игра, в которой вы будете смеяться над названиями некоторых слияний и, без сомнения, рекомендуемую, более бесплатную. Что если, останется, что Симпсоны отсутствуют 4/10.

➥ хотя я играю в течение короткого времени, я предлагаю вам несколько рекомендаций, которые помогут вам быстро продвинуться; не накапливайте много денег, тратьте, когда можете, в пачках по 5000, если мы сосредоточимся на режиме приключений, мы получим ценные карты раньше, всегда пытайтесь исследовать карты, помните время слияния и особенно не лучшие карты сумасшедшим способом, фрагменты они в конечном итоге окажутся в дефиците.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065637682', 'num_games_owned': 1146, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 7084, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1669290812}
review:
[h1]Análisis de Animation Throwdown [/h1]

➥Llevo un par de días jugando a este juego de cartas basado en series de animación muy conocidas de la FOX como Padre de familia o Futurama entre otras y puedo decir que me ha sorprendido para bien. Además el juego base gratuito ofrece horas de diversión y sobre todo entretenimiento. También contiene varios Dlc, (ahora hay un bundle por 10€ rebajado) y como buen "Pay to Win" si quieres tener un gran progreso tendrás que preparar la cartera para conseguir las mejores cartas.

➥Si lo que quieres es echar un rato de vez en cuando, el juego te ofrece varios modos de juego; aventura, arena, torneos, misiones diarias, incluso unirte a gremios con lo que obtendrás más beneficios. Además de una gran colección de cartas. Cada partida que ganes sumarás monedas que te servirán para comprar  packs nuevos y aumentar la colección.

➥La jugabilidad es simple, partidas de 1 Vs 1, hasta que agotes tu energía, después debes esperar. Comienzas con una baraja base, aunque pronto obtendrás nuevas cartas las cuales podrás, subir de nivel, fusionar, investigar o reciclar si no te interesan. Las mejoras de cartas sirven para que en la partida puedas realizar combos y fusiones más poderosas, no busquéis esas fusiones en la baraja que no aparecerán.

➥Un juego bastante divertido, con el que te reirás con los nombres de algunas fusiones y en definitiva recomendado sin duda, más siendo free.  Eso si, le resta que falten Los Simpsons. 4/10.

➥ᙅoᥒ⳽ᥱʝo⳽: aunque llevo poco jugando os ofrezco unas pautas que os vendrán bien para avanzar rápido; no acumules mucho dinero, gasta siempre que puedas en packs de 1000 o 5000 max., si nos centramos en el modo aventura conseguiremos cartas valiosas antes, procura investigar cartas siempre, ten en cuenta los tiempos de fusión y sobre todo no mejores cartas a lo loco, los tomavatios acabarán siendo escasos.


https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2320567550 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2304266535

author: {'steamid': '76561197976090954', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 39373, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3985, 'last_played': 1644144875}
review: Ce jeu est très sympa au début. Vous pouvez progresser assez simplement sans passer utiliser votre CB. Vous allez monter assez facilement au dernier niveau du mode arène et là vous allez vite vous rendre compte que c'est un pay to win. Dès la 1ère carte vous savez si vous allez pouvoir espérer voler la victoire ou pas. Il y a pas mal de challenges où on peut voir les points gagnés par d'autres joueurs et dans ceux-ci, vous verrez certains joueurs atteindre les 200 000 points dès le 1er jour alors qu'une légendaire rapporte seulement 500 points. Vous aurez vite compris que beaucoup de joueurs dépensent une fortune dans ce jeu et que lorsque vous arrivez au dernier niveau de l'arène, ce sont ces joueurs que vous rencontrez, et vous n'avez plus aucune chance de vous amuser ...

author: {'steamid': '76561198958635526', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 7404, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4411, 'last_played': 1636384389}
review:
В целом игра норм, но после 10ур арены начинается глина! бесконечное ожидание грейда карт и энергии для участии на арене(
Так же косяк с капсулой для апгрейда комбо ( после визита туда, слетает игра и все иконки становятся пустые) 
В начале игры захватывающе быстрый и многообещающий прогресс внушает тебе иллюзию, что ты нашел игру мечты. Но как я говорил выше, после определенного уровня все становится очень монотонно. Имеются косяки динамики боя и другие незначительные визуальные. В целом по этой причине отказался от какого либо доната. Жаль... Ставлю этой игре 3 Озабоченных Куагмаера из 10
Всем Мир!

review:
Decent enough Skinner-Box game, but you hit a pay wall after about 8 hours. Fun for a bit, not worth real money though.

A couple more things,
-Even if you're playing against another player's deck, you're fighting an AI
-Your opponents are mostly if not entirely populated with AI, that is to say even if they have a name they're not real decks that other people made, you'll notice that the AI repeats itself and adjusts it's game play, skill set, and cards based on how often you forfeit/lose.

The game is a literal money pit, but if you find it charming enough I can see why some people play it and buy stuff. Kinda like slot machines, but it's not possible to get your money back here.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972142968', 'num_games_owned': 1922, 'num_reviews': 140, 'playtime_forever': 4421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4412, 'last_played': 1624616122}
review:
Right off the bat, I'll say:
1) The game is enjoyable (at first).
2) Premium currency is given out at reasonable rates. You don't have to spend money to become competitive, though it doesn't hurt.
3) Steam is not the place to play Animation Throwdown. You want to play this on your phone, due to the benefits of ads. Fortunately you can link your account to your mobile so you can collect the achievements, here on Steam.

Now, while I do enjoy AT, I'm getting ready to walk away from it and here's why. I hate games with timers & cooldowns. AT forces you to play when they want you to play & wait or pay for round credits. Essentially you have to build a schedule around the game. This sucks of you work or have a life. I've been waking up in the morning & crushing everything I can because I don't want to be racing expiring timers at the end of the day. I hate games that do this & while I had fun with what I played, I'm getting bored/irritated with this.

I'll recommend AT, but only if you are willing to dedicate a ton of time to it or you're willing to miss out if you can't keep the day's schedule.

All in all I spent around $10 for the 2 permanent perk packs. I played for about a month before I decided to buy in & never found them necessary, but they help alot. And $10 seems fair considering I played for almost 2 months at the time of this review.
