author: {'steamid': '76561198295572427', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4045, 'last_played': 1549028426}
review:
the game is designed very cheap. 

Thats how i felt with the game playing it for several months now, without using add boost, doing offers or spending money. Its like a build in frustration curve to make you do something of the methods above.

What happens in the first months absolutely has nothing to do with the real game mechanics, its more like a tease to make you play the game and enjoying it in a very cheap way. The first battles are all very easy and you play with cards, you will never need again, so theres no point in symathising with those. You will soon get it, that its all about the blue, pink and golden cards. The rest is automatically free to recycle. At this point the game becomes an totally idiotic grind, because you have to constantly buy packs. The problem is, that there are different types of packs. Those you can buy with the in game currency of coins and the others you can only buy with the premium currency of gems.

The problem is, that the chance of getting a blue card in common packs is around 1/50.The rest of the cards is crap. You cant get pink or golden cards in there. You get 1 card in those packs.

The packs you can buy with gems are very expensive for 450 gems a pack because you only get 20 gems a day through a daily repeating quest line. So you can buy one of those packs in a month, as long as you log in daily. You get 3 cards out of it, where one is blue or higher.

All cards you get there are totally random most of the time its the same crap you always get.

All the other cards are permanently recycled for ANOTHER currency called giggitywatts, because guess what: if you manage to get one of the cards you need

You need the same card two times to fuse it into a stronger version of itself, but before you can do that, you have to level the card (grey 3 level, green 4, blue 5 and pink and golden 6) by putting giggitywatts into it. Then you have to fuse two times to get the maximum strenght level of the card (there are 3), then level it to max. So basically you need one card 4 times, use as many giggitywatts as you get in around 1-2 months to level it out. So this is an absurd grind just to get one good card PLUS its a game with the wheels of fate, because you can also end up getting all the blues you dont need.

Adventure mode is over once you reach around chapter 24, because the paywall starts hitting you there heavily. The enemies only play the same two combos all the time, plus they have maxed out cards. You also cant play indefinitely, because they build in a cheap energy system to stretch the time you need to play through. The same goes with arena, which is basically "pvp", where you will never battle a real person, but battle the ai with other players decks. because the games mechanics are so cheap, they dont even offer a real balanced gameplay.

Basically the game is around playing the strongest card and one shotting everything. If you cant do so, you cant hold up with the ai, which is basically playing the game with a free demonic tutor. the gameplay is straight, once you win you win and once you loose, you loose. theres no big room for playing around or real tactics. Some cards or combos are unbelievable strong, while others suck 24/7. 

You get flooded with offers inside the game where you can spend 5 dollar for that and 20 for that and here and there.


So to count it all up: 

The  game is about endless grinding. You will have light fun with it, until the paywall hits you. from there on its your choice, if you want to participate in this bad designed milking cow,or if you just want to throw away your sympathy for the great series, the game uses to catch you with, and see the game as what it is: a cheaply designed money cow with the mask of a nicely grinning peter griffin. JUST CHEAP!

author: {'steamid': '76561198012693496', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 354, 'playtime_forever': 3660, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2070, 'last_played': 1624898094}
review:
It is a really good free2play game with some adult cartoons like Family Guy, Futurama, Bob's burgers, King of the Hill. I started to watch Bob's burgers because of this game, I didn't see any episodes of it until this game.

I really recommend it because it is fun and not pay2win at all. I managed to open a Legendary card even from a normal game coin of 1000 packs. You also can get a lot of Epic cards from the single player story as well. If you fuse them together, then you get even more powerful cards.

I really like the game as it is, card battles with not so many difficult stats and rules. Simple but entertaning, balanced!

The time of research can be a little bit long if you try to get high powered combos, but this is OK.

Leveling up your characters seem to be hard, because you get random amount of tokens for random heroes every time.. but it is ok until you get enemies in PVP who's level is simillar to yours, can accept that.

Thumbs up! Great work, keep it up.

9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198000257885', 'num_games_owned': 1314, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 2395, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2391, 'last_played': 1507278944}
review:
If you enjoy card/ deck building games and the cartoons featured in Animation Throwdown you might like this game.... or you might not.... 

As far as deck building its pretty simplified and gets boring quickly. You play one card each turn, it has power and toughness  and varied effects depending on the card rarity. Theres no limit to which cards you can have in your deck but you are limited to a total of 35 cards per deck. Different characters to play as and card morphing can switch it up a bit but the cards really make the difference.

If you're wondering if this is a pay to win game you could be right. You can purchase packs that are guarenteed to give rare cards if you've got "stupid" money to spend ( Philip J. Fry - "SHUT UP AND TAKE MY MONEY!!"). Although its a bit hard to say its pay to win when there is no actual pvp. You dont ever actually play against other humans... The a.i. merely takes over a deck that someone has built. So Im not sure if theres really any winning? 

If you enjoy the cartoons you may get a few good laughs out of some of the cards which reference many episodes of the series. The game is good for a few hours for being free but after a bit it gets repetative and overall grindy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044687300', 'num_games_owned': 559, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 11863, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 760, 'last_played': 1605371346}
review:
[h1]Персонажи "Гриффинов", "Закусочной Боба", "Футурамы", "Американского папаши" и "Царя горы" встретились и смешались в Animation Throwdown, новой увлекательной коллекционной карточной игре.[/h1]

Как говорил Рексар: "-И верно!" Animation Trowdown - карточная игра по вселенной всем знакомых американских мультсериалов, [spoiler]увы без Симпсонов[/spoiler]. Игра довольно проста и понятна с первых мгновений, к тому же есть обучение. По сюжету (да-да) происходит взрыв при неудачном эксперименте Профессора Фарнсворта. Происходит какое-то смешивание всех выше перечисленных мультиков и... бойня. 
Игровое поле - кусок земли с мультика, с которого наш противник. Карты имеют свои способности (перчаточка, вонючка, бомбочка, стенка и тд), которые и заставляют немного подумать и навязать противнику свою игру. Ах, да, карты бывают типовые. Есть персонажи (типа, Питер, Лоис, Боб) и назовем их апгрейды (Фортепиано Лоис, Костюмы Роджера, Игрок). Собственно, карта становится мощнее, когда мы их перемешиваем. Так же, есть и главные персонажи, которые тоже имеют способности.
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Плюсы[/th]
        [th]Описание[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Знакомая вселенная[/td]
        [td]Лично меня, игра привлекла именно тем, что там персонажи из знакомых и любимых мне мультсериалов.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Простота[/td]
        [td]Довольно понятное и простое обучение.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Юмор[/td]
        [td]Нельзя не выделить этот фактор. Во время склейки персонажа с апгрейдом, получаем карту с каким либо юморным скетчем. Ностальги-ия![/td]
    [/tr]
   [tr]
        [td]Ивенты, ПВП, обновления[/td]
        [td]В игре проводятся ивенты и довольно часто. ПВП арена здесь простецкая: за игрока играет бот. Игру не торопятся забрасывать, обновления выходят не редко.[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]

[table]
    [tr]
        [th]Минусы[/th]
        [th]Описание[/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Донат[/td]
        [td]Всё-таки, в игре есть донат и он дает большое преимущество. Чем больше у игрока фиолетовых карт и склеек с ней, тем легче играть и проходить всевозможные ивенты и ПВП арены. Что, конечно же, помогает донатам занимать более высокие места в рейтинге и получать более ценные призы.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Защита персонажа на ПВП арене[/td]
        [td]Немного проспойлерю, но на арене у противника (с какого-то уровня) ставится первой картой защита. Это карта с определенным количеством здоровья и способностями. Такой ход довольно увеличивает время боя, а порой и помогает победить.[/td]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td]Фиолетовые карты[/td]
        [td]Всё решает количество фиолетовых карт. У моего друга их очень много. Он не прослеживает тактику, не придерживается, а тупо ставит фиолки. В результате, проходит дальше меня и оказывается выше в рейтинге.[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]
Рекомендую игру тем, кому не противен жанр карточных игр и кто любит американские мультсериальчики. Игра стоит того, чтобы потратить на нее кучу времени.
Кстати, игра так же доступна на [url=https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kongregate.mobile.throwdown.google]Google Play[/url] (android) , там я и начал играть.

review: Очень хорошая карточная игра с вашими любимыми героями мультсериалов. Постоянные обновления и инвенты, а ещё каждую неделю добавляют новые карты. Донат как таковой присутствует, но лишь ускоряет развитие, как и в любой другой онлайн игре. Его можно понемногу получать каждый день. Так же присутствует развитая система комбинаций карт. Советую всем любителям карточных баталий. 8/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960404940', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1505432493}
review:
Definitely a cheap cash-grab. Shame to see in a PC game, but when they give you "daily energy" and sell "gems" look out. It would even be a potential wallet drainer if the game were even half entertaining.

The card combos are worth a brief, "Oh yeah, okay. That references this one time on the show." and if you're not a fan of a particular show? Yeah, not even really very funny. I *love* Futurama, but a Futurama deck couldn't even make me crack a grin. It was pretty sad.

The tutorial is horrible. Slow, tedious, easy and then suddenly - impossible. "Oh hey, new thing - upgrading your deck! Here's how you do it..."

If this game were forced into my timeline, Leela or no Leela, I wouldn't go through it all again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198350558471', 'num_games_owned': 437, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 3137, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2916, 'last_played': 1534589672}
review:
[h1]Animation Throwdown: The Quest Cards / Animación Tirar: La Búsqueda de las Cartas [/h1]
Juego de cartas en el que las cartas son personajes de las series Padre de familia, Bob's Burgers Futurama, American Dad y El Rey de la Colina.
Puntos Positivos y Negativos:

[h1]Positivos[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Modo Historia con buena dificultad, ademas de más modos como lo de los gremios y el gimnasio[/b]
[*][b]Ranked muy balanceado[/b]
[*][b]Logros dificiles, más retos dentro del juego[/b]
[*][b]Es Gratis[/b]
[/list]
[h1]Negativos[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Es gratis así que los micropagos hacen que te chetes mucho: [i]Pay2Win[/i][/b]
[*][b]Falta de Steam Cloud[/b]
[/list]

[quote=Marloncha][i]¡Padre de familia! ¡Bob's Burgers! ¡Futurama! ¡American Dad! ¡El Rey de la Colina! ¡Esto es ANIMATION THROWDOWN! [/i][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198093887976', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 4064, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3192, 'last_played': 1667321723}
review:
This game has some glaring features that make it a bad tcg. The random abilities are NOT random, they seem to be semi-random and in most of the times will be against what you need, and exactly what the AI needs. 

The matchmaking is terrible, resulting in very few interesting matches in pvp
And about every random feature seems to be aimed in needing to spend more money
the guild events are too rare and far between, there hardly seems to be interaction with the guild
If you spend some money, you will rarely get your moneys worth. 

Play the game for about 20 hours, because after that the glaring faults start to rise.

review: Casual Card game that shouldn't be on Steam. It's a money grabber by nature, but I haven't spent a dime and still enjoy and get a crack out of the card combinations for short bursts. I usually do the daily quests and it's a grind, but it takes time to reasearch card combos. The gameplay is actually more strategic than you'd imagine, but requires having a deep collection of cards, so it's not a bad idea to keep beefed up common cards for specialized decks. Huge fan of all of the shows. I think that they should throw in some Cleveland Show cards for shits and giggles

author: {'steamid': '76561198039799317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 30558, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19940, 'last_played': 1589884882}
review:
Comme chacun sait, en début septembre, c'est la rentrée des cartes ! Des classes ? Ah ? Et ça consiste en quoi ? 

Animation Trhowdown: The Quest for Cards, qu'on va vite résumer en AT, est un jeu de cartes aux decks basés sur cinq séries plus ou moins connues chez nous et où futurama tient le haut du panier niveau joliesse des dessins. Eh ouais, ça calme. Mais rassurez-vous, vous pouvez mixer toutes les cartes que vous voulez, le deck n'a d'importance que pour certaines cartes qui offrent un bonus précis à certaines autres. Mais un gamin de King of the Hill peut très bien se droguer avec les produits d'American Dad, aucun souci. 

Car ouais, en plus de fusionner quand un objet et un personnage s'assemblent, on fout un peu la moralité au vestiaire. Persos qui boivent, fument, se piquent, font du harcèlement sexuel et parfois virent carrément dans l'allusion pédophile, niveau ambiance, les séries d'origine sont respectées et comporteront nombre de références qui raviront les habitués. On se marre. 

Point de vue forme, vous allez très vite comprendre que tout, ou presque, dépend de votre puissance de deck plutôt que sur vos talents. Déjà, pas de joueur contre joueur, tu affrontes une IA avec son deck ou celui d'un autre joueur. Et comme tout est basé sur celui qui a la plus grosse,  ben ta stratégie peut t'aider à vaincre plus balèze, mais globalement mise surtout sur ta puissance brute pour l'emporter. 

Le jeu en soi est simple, s'assimile très vite et propose assez de combats et trucs à d'bloquer pour vraiment être rodé quand on retire les petites roues latérales. Mais ouais, faut accepter la notion de pay2win, en ce sens que tout mettra plus de temps sans payer. Après, perso j'y joue gratos et j'ai un bon deck. On dégote des cartes épiques dans de simples paquets si on a de la chance ( j'ai eu Bender et Roger Smith assez vite, après ça comment tu veux que je râle ? ), il ya de nombreux mods pour gagner des sous, de quoi monter le niveau de son deck, de quoi tenter d'avoir des cartes qui font mal. AT se joue sur la durée, c'est le truc sympa où tu vas faire tes 10 minutes de quêtes quotidiennes, t'investir dans une guilde si tu veux augmenter tes chances d'avoir de bonnes cartes et surtout passer un bon moment. Et c'est tout ce qu'on demande à un jeu de cartes. Parce que personne ne va sortir un free2play à perte et que, même si AT a des bonus exclusivement payants, ils ne sont pas de l'ordre de te faire gagner ou non une partie, mais du temps que tu mettras à optimiser ton jeu. Et dans ces conditions, ça me convient. Sois patient et tu profiteras du jeu que subventionneront les zêlés de la victoire rapide. 

Pour la version steam, attention tout de même, le chat de guilde et les boosts liés aux publicités à regarder ne sont pas affichables. par contre, le jeu se lance plus vite et est plus fluide que via kongregate, le site du jeu. Donc...ben choisis. AT est un bon passe temps quand tu attends que l'eau bouillisse ou que tu veux tuer un peu de temps au lieu de te mettre à une activité plus contraignante. Et si tu veux jouer beaucoup, tu peux largement dépasser l'heure de combats par jour, alors tu as de quoi t'occuper. 

Je suis content de cette découverte qui a au moins l'avantage de ne jamais tomber dans le déséquilibrage de la surenchère, vu que de base il y a une hiérarchisation nette des decks par castes des cartes ainsi que le niveau des héros qui les utilisent. Apprends les bases, vois si tu accroches et fais-toi ton avis. Dans tous les cas, il est gratuit. Tu n'auras perdu que du temps. Bon jeu et gloire à Roger Smith. Je vous invite d'ailleurs chaleureusement à découvrir Futurama, pionnier de la série mettant en scène des protagonistes antihéroïques et même psychopathes. Un héritage de Matt Groening, père des Simpsons et qui a tout simplement empêché les producteurs de la série de lisser les personnages et les propos. Et je vous recommande American Dad aussi, un délire outrancier entre Futurama et South Park niveau trash, bien qu'elle devienne de plus en plus décomplexée au fur et à mesure des saisons. Elle critique l'Amérique et les idées préconçues, souvent avec des nuances et une intelligence de propos déguisée par de la fausse bêtise et une vraie envie de vous faire marrer tout en vous donnant parfois honte de rire. Les trois autres séries, je les connais trop peu ( Bob's Burger ) ou ne les aime pas assez ( King of the Hill, Family Guy ) pour vraiment vous les conseiller. Ah, et les VF de Futurama et American Dad dépotent, je les favorise aux VO d'ailleurs. C'est pas souvent qu'on peut dire ça.

author: {'steamid': '76561198397858577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 8889, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7916, 'last_played': 1504476361}
review: Played the game for over 2 months, and put in 147 hours. I must say it's horrible piece of crap. Noting but Pay to win people in any of the competitive modes, and just keeps getting worse as time goes by. There is literally almost 0 ways to catch anyone without dumping $100's of dollars into the game. I literally mean $100's because what you can buy in the game is junk. You have to drop $100 at a time to get anything good, I wish I would of never played this game. I bought the 2 starter packs thinking I would stand a chance to do okay... Ha not with the amount of garbage a$$ pay to win people this game has. You will never get a decent reward in any game mode because you can never get high enough on the leader boards with the pay to win d0uche's everywhere. So unless you feel like burning your money just to play a garbage game I would move on.

author: {'steamid': '76561198050373588', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 57290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19071, 'last_played': 1537287843}
review: Бесплатная игра. Ачивки и карты. Донат. Так как я бедный и денег просто нет, играю в свое удовольствие и не парюсь. Да, игроки-донатеры быстрее и больше развивают свои карты, да и пусть. Сын вообще сразу бросил игруху, так как посчитал, что одни и те же карты, да еще с донатом - это абсурд. А вот меня захватило. Создатели игры постоянно допиливают и развивают карты. За дизайн мультяшек и комбо, за превосходную ситуацию зависимости от вливаний игроками (донат с умом) - пятерка!

author: {'steamid': '76561198136298273', 'num_games_owned': 557, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1098, 'last_played': 1626208426}
review:
[h1][b] Second Chance Review - Sept. 13th 2017 5:06PM	[/b][/h1]
I don't have anything bad to say about the game at this point. It seems to work much better than the first time I attempted to run the game 2 weeks ago. The game loads up within seconds for me & runs very smoothly. 
I give the game a [b]9.9[/b]/[b]10.0[/b]. Congratulations to you guys. Keep it up, you have my vote.
[h1][b] Original Review - Aug. 29th 2017 5:50PM	[/b][/h1]
I've played this game on my android phone before, and I [b] LOVED	[/b] it. When my brother told me about this game I hastily downloaded this game, in a very short time might I add. I was excited to start playing, but the rating didn't seem to great, but I wanted to give it a try anyways. But the fact of the matter is that this game takes a really log time to load up. I opened this game at [b] 5:35	[/b] and within seconds the game loaded up to[b] 25%	[/b] which is amazing, I figured it has some background loading to do before it caught up, or perhaps some downloading of files. It has bee 8 minutes and counting since then and I still have not passed the[b] 25%	[/b] mark. I do not believe this game is truly playable at this moment in time due to this setback.
I really do enjoy this game and I will let it run for about 5 more minutes but at the moment, I will have to downvote it.
[b] 5:50	[/b] Still not loading... Shame.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984040110', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 21490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4558, 'last_played': 1626010906}
review:
A solid card game with interesting mechanics.

I enjoy this f2p game and dont really feel its pay2win if you play it an hour or so each day you can upgrade your deck slowly, but just enough to keep you coming back each day. 

I haven't spent anything (yet, im tempted but not enough) and havent really felt I need to in order to compete and play.

The only anoying thing for me is the timed regen of "points" in order to play the campaign, but I'm still able to complete the daily quests in an hour or so.

Overall 8/10

review: I've had this on my cellphone for over a year I think. IDK how often I'll play it here, but I linked my accounts. It's a good game, there is a lot of microtransaction sorta things, just like every card game, but it's not needed or obtrusive to your enjoyment. I've been working on it for a long time now and I cannot say I will be stopping. It's just an all around good deck building card game. IDK what else to say. There is pros and cons to it being on pc, but if you're not playing it on your cell phone, I say give it a try. If you like it enough here, get the app version. Just not a whole lot to say.

author: {'steamid': '76561198385501958', 'num_games_owned': 26, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 445, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 371, 'last_played': 1522821075}
review:
I saw this on free to play with steam achievements so I decided to get it and see if it was any good. Honestly? It's like most other card battle games out there. There's nothing really unique about it to stand out. 

This game is heavily rigged to make you buy cards with real money. A lot of the people on Player versus Player are really hard to beat as they went on to buy the legendary cards that they need to beat everyone they can. There really isn't much about this, other than that.

We know all the characters, and they barely say anything new. After 0.1 hours of playing it, it's become very repetitive for me, and it's honestly gotten boring. I'm already only playing it to get all the achievements for it. The achievements are relatively easy to gain, so if you're an achievement hunter, maybe look into getting this. If not, I doubt there'll be anything in it for you, unless you're a massive FOX fan and love every show involved in this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198257897759', 'num_games_owned': 181, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 12850, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3836, 'last_played': 1643308313}
review:
So far I found the game pretty addictive. It's pretty much like most card games: you'll be building decks & battling them against each other, just like other card games. I have haven't spend any money in-game, but can see why you’d be tempted to, especially for faster research and rare cards.

Pro's: 
- Addicting
- Fun
- "Free"
- Nice game to pass some time
- Amount of chapters 

Cons: 
- Leveling up takes a while.
- There should be an option where you can choose how many cards you want to buy. Sometimes I feel like buying 10 cards, but I don't want to click 10 times, the other option is to buy "Buy Maximum"
- "Free"

author: {'steamid': '76561198169789121', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 4170, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3962, 'last_played': 1533761289}
review:
Zu Beginn unterhaltsam, vor allem wenn man Fan der Cartoon-Serien ist.
Mit einem Kongregate-Account kann man das Spiel Platform übergreifend spielen (PC & Handy).
Sehr einfaches Konzept & free to play, allerdings geht es ab Level 13+ stark in Richtung pay2win.
Schade ist auch, dass Handy-Spieler den Vorteil haben, Werbung ansehen zu können, um den Loot-Multiplikator für 4 Stunden auf bis zu 1.5x zu pushen.
Insgesamt gesehen dennoch ein gutes Game für Zwischendurch :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198354849656', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1502554195}
review:
Карточные игры в Стиме перестали быть редкостью (когда же уже карточных Дурака, 1000, Паука, Пьяницу добавят? ГЕЙБ, МЫ ЖДЕМ!): кто-то играет в свежак по серии TES, кто-то все еще осваивает проблемы в Астробое - а нам же достался особый случай с никому ничего не говорящим названием. Однако начинка может показаться если не вкусной, то как минимум удобоваримой. А теперь мы двинем в бургерный фургон Боба.

Собрав под одной крышей персонажей многих мультсериалов студии FOX (но не всех, будем честны) и даже обосновав такое сближение несближаемого - хотя бы по части визуала - создатели игры создали карточную игру, часть контента которой может нас взбесить или заставить ожесточенно играть до момента окончания лимита доступных действий, а также жестоко поиметь наши ностальгические чувства.

Так как знаком я до начала игры был только с персонажами Family Guy и Futurama, то и обращал внимание своё только на них. Потому, посмотрев полностью все сезоны Футурамы несколько лет назад, морально я отдыхал, посматривая, как карта с Лилой-качком уфигачивала какого-то очередного Хэнка - короче говоря, как фанат сериала, я говорю игре ДА. Плюс рисовка, повторяющая один в один оригиналы, какой-никакой стимул качать, улучшать и изучать карты, ибо без этого режим "истории" не пройти (хотя я♥♥♥♥♥♥ когда смогу его одолеть), да еще возможность познакомиться ближе с сериалами, о которых никогда не слышал. Я таким макаром аж захотел Bob's burgers начать смотреть, Луиза прикольным персонажем смотрится...

Но, как и любой бесплатной игры в Стиме, есть и у данного примера минусы. Первым и самым главным является донат. Дальше - постоянное ожидание возможности выполнить новые действия и невозможность бесплатно промотать его (то есть, через часы на своем компе, что естественно серьезный минус, ибо мы все ценим свое время, верно?)). Ну а завершает триаду отсутствие Симпсонов.

Последнее вполне можно понять: за все время существования сериала там появилось столько героев, что вместить даже основных - уже задача из задач. Плюс, несмотря на свою явную стагнацию, Симпсоны продолжают оставаться одним из лучших мультсериалов, то есть очень популярными. На их фоне все эти Короли холма или Американские папаши смотрятся непрезентабельно, соответственно, и внимание всё от них бы отвлекалось. А ведь игра-то существует по сути как кроссовер-реклама этих самых сериалов, чего Симпсонам, как раскрученному бренду, уже не нужно.

Спрашивается - а зачем тогда там Футурама, она же закончилась года четыре назад? Мое мнение - чтобы порадовать фанатов (ну и обосновать сам синтез несинтезируемого). Хотя формата карточной игры всё же недостаточно для этого, ибо нет интересных ситуаций и диалогов, есть лишь карточки с любимыми персонажами. И за это только я могу рекомендовать игру.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039630044', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3838, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3473, 'last_played': 1503337651}
review: I played the game for about 64 hous total now and its fun but a bit repetative. It is one of those games that u play it for like 30 min every day, its perfect for people who are busy and can't play a game for 6 hours straight. Do daily missions and lvl up and do arena and collect and upgrade your cards. I agree some people may pay to help get cards or lvl up faster, but Everything in the game can be gotten by just playing so it is not Pay to Win. But if u want to be number 1 on the leaderboard on how many wins u have this week.... then yes it is concidered pay to win. But u can play and win and have fun doing it without cash :) Also Nostalgia in regards to all of the great animated TV shows... "o yea i saw that item or character in that one episode"

I have started a legal case because of this and i am demanding a total refund since Kongregate created this bug by choice and choosed to make it able to use for over 6 weeks before they removed it. They knew about the bug after 1 week and still let people use it just so they could ban them and get rid of the top players worldwide to even out the score! DONT PLAY THIS GAME AND IF YOU DO, DONT PAY FOR ANYTHING!!! THEY WILL SCREW YOU OVER!!!

review:

review: Без доната играть можно, но вот только прогресс в игре замедляется с каждым уровнем в 2-5 раз. Из игры, где раз в день можно увидеть что-то новое она превратилась в парад одного и того же. Заметно, что игра подкручивает карты в колоде так, чтобы выпадали чаще бесполезные и слабые. Это основная палка в колеса, из-за которой тратишь энергию в пустую. Но зато только сейчас уперся в потолок, где нужны фиолетовые карты (как минимум 5 из 25 в колоде).

author: {'steamid': '76561198325245237', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 12554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7891, 'last_played': 1511162075}
review:
It's a crummy pay-to-play that  keeps trying to sell you almost nothing for lots of real money. You might  feel a temporary twinge of shopping happiness when you buy a few hundred gems/whatever for $19.95 until you realize it's gonna take several thousand to actually do anything.

Otherwise if like me you refuse to pay money to encourage this awful scamming practice, it's a free to play grind that only lets you play for a short while and wait several hours before being allowed to play some more.

There's an arena mode where you play against "real people" - I put that in quotes because it's actually AI opponents with seemingly real players' names assigned to them. I wonder if I'm out there as an AI opponent too, playing games that I had no input to.

Yeah, it features all your favorite cartoon characters and more, but there's absolutely NO voice acting/responses and very minimal 2 to 3 frame animations. It's basically like those child care centers with barbed wire around them and badly painted Disney characters slapped all over it.

Oh and on the topic of Guilds - you're encouraged to join one to play "Skirmishes" and other styles. I felt lucky to find one that actually had a spot open! They  all seemed already filled to capacity! But I quickly discovered that I was the only ACTIVE member in the guild I joined. Even the founder hadn't played in months. 

So I figured I'd start my own guild and give new players a fresh guild to join with almost no members. Well it's been a few weeks and nobody seems to know my guild exists. Without 15 guild members, I'm essentially banned from playing any of those extra play styles.

You might look at the hundreds of hours I've spent "playing" this game. Like I said, if you're going the FREE-TO-PLAY route by cleverly avoiding all the prompts to spend money, it's a GRIND, GRIND, GRIND. I always feel like I should be doing something else. But it keeps you going with a carrot/stick that gives you very little reward for lots of GRIND. And if it weren't for the fact that I love some of these cartoon characters, and hate some of them enough to want to hurt them in some small way, I wouldn't even bother with it.

If you're a big fan of these cartoons, it doesn't cost anything to try it for yourself. But I'll guarantee you won't find much fun in this one. Especially as that stupid BUY SOME STUFF screen pops up every time you launch and has at least 3 major buttons in the main interface. And it's not nickle-and-dime stuff either. They're talking like $14.00 - $99.00 payments that you'll regret 10 minutes after purchasing and finding that you actually need a WHOLE LOT MORE to even begin what you had hoped to do. It's a half-inch away from an outright scam.

2/10 I give it an extra point because of my fantasy of what I'd do to that Propane Guy's daughter if I won her in a card game. Yeah I'd raep her in front of him and his texas redneck buddies while shouting YEEHAW AMERIKUH!

author: {'steamid': '76561198100733233', 'num_games_owned': 1264, 'num_reviews': 317, 'playtime_forever': 13223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5842, 'last_played': 1513218413}
review:
Um jogo de cartas muito divertido, baseado nas séries da Fox como por exemplo American Dad!, Family Guy, King of the Hill entre outras.
O jogo além de ser muito bom, ainda é de graça, você pode gastar grana real dentro do jogo mais não e necessário, eu mesmo não uso dinheiro no jogo, somente o dinheiro de dentro do jogo mesmo, fazendo as missoes diárias da pra juntar de pouco em pouco. 
Jogo contém uma técnica de combinação de cartas muito legal, deixando tal mais desafiante pelo fato de que essas fusôes deixam algumas delas muito fortes.
Minha nota para o jogo é 10/10.
Muito bom mesmo, vale a pena conferir.

review:
Animation Throwdown is card game that features five different animated shows in one game. Game idea is simple collect cards, combine them to make fun and stronger combos. Game features 30 chapters of Adventuring from animated shows. 
Game features PVP arena and weekly events. Game is overall great for those who love card games or like any of shows in this game. Great game to spend some time in it but it I would prefer other card games on steam. 

Rating 7.4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198067201303', 'num_games_owned': 64, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 10, 'last_played': 1533072449}
review:
Played it first from the playstore and loved it, fun for wasting time when you have it. However, as others have mention once your free to play bubble pops, you have to shell out some cash. Most of the time you can find sales on the phone version, steam version, and webiste version that make it not that bad to shell out some monies~ I have probably spent about 50$ on this game but I have waited for sales and I problaby have gotten 150$ worth of goodies for it. My deck has gotten me very very far. I'm in the secret fight club and my guild usually scores around <500 in every rumble so I can't complaint. I only downloaded the steam version to get the bundle deal they had before. But anyway, you're probably better off playing on the phone since you can watch ads for higher coin and turd drops or from the website.

My tip to you: enjoy the game until your free to play bubble pops and once that happens, decide if it's worth for you to spend or not. Wait for sales if you do decide to spend some cash as you're going to get a better deal. Search for deals everywhere, on their site, phone version, and steam version to get the most bang for you buck.

The website also has a currency call KREDS which you can complete offers to get and later on use to buy in game goodies. But ya, as a veteran player, you can make it very very far for around 30$ if you're smart about it.

Buy the reseach accelerator [when it's on sale]
Hunt down deals on all the platforms
Complete offers to get KREDS and use it to buy the monthly pass
Research your build and don't waste your giggity watts.

= Profit.

review:
[h1]Скука и  вымогательство пришедшие из AppStore[/h1]

Хочешь играть больше - плати или жди несколько часов, сутки, чтобы продолжить. Но в данном случае, Animation Throwdown: The Quest for Cards это идёт на пользу. Потому что иначе игра надоела бы ещё быстрее. Забавно конечно смотреть на скриншоты в виде карточех из любимых мультфильмов, но болльше достоинств у этой игры нет. Лучше ещё раз посмотреть эти самые мультфильмы.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013539267', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1504426617}
review:
Fun until the giant pay wall comes down and squashes you like a bug.    Its your typical mobile cash grab.    The energy system is brutally punishing but to disguise this they give you all sort of free stuff at the start.   When that runs out you're screwed.    Plus at the start you level fast and get constant energy restores.    Once the free stuff + easy levels are gone its awful.     Of course i fully expected this and didn't stick around too long.  

Its not so bad if you know what you're getting into and just want to waste 4 hours.   Its fun for a little while just to mess around with the cards and see what they do.    Of course there are like infinity + 100 games exactly like this both card games and stamina system games.    

The whole strategy is to make it just fun enough at the start that you'll start to like it,  then they make it so you can't play.    Its like giving a baby a toy and then taking it away.   They want to you to chase after it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990930149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 743, 'last_played': 1634711109}
review:
This game is very addicting. Its a very simple card game much like Hearthstone.
Pros- Good gameplay thats very fun. Card can be upgraded and researched making them more powerful. Game is F2P.

Cons- The normal woes of a f2p game... energy system, battle pple who have spent money and play unkillable cards. Wait times for researching new card combos.

The call:
Its a good time killer. 
After about an hour you are done for the day.... If you are researching a epic or greater card
You get 1 energy per 10 min but without spending money the cap is pretty low making it not worth the wait.
If you have the time to kill you can grow in this game and still have a life.
Id say it's worth checking out!

author: {'steamid': '76561197983014485', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 1318, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1318, 'last_played': 1505722003}
review:
[h1]I hate this game yet i love it... [/h1]

The game is very simple but after a few fights you'll notice there is actually depth so i love it.

It's a blatent freemium game trying to squeeze you for money hate it.. but i haven't given it a single dime~

The arena looks like pvp but itsn't, normally would be hated but takes away all the rush making and a sit back and chil experience so love it~
Mainly because that means that you can get insane op card combination's without worrying for balance~

The research system allowing to unlock new card "fusion's" is pretty much is is blantently trying to squeeze you for money but my deck is already chock full of epic and rare cards from a single player campaign (ish, a simple one though) so i love it.

Basically i hate that i love it..

ps: ow yea i guess the whole 5 ip thing is kinda cool?


EDIT: changes it to a not recommend for 2 reasons:
-> Game advertises itself to be pvp, it is not it is against ai pretending to be players (the ai is also pretty dumb)
-> I regret all the time i have sunk into this game (way beyond what it says cause i play it on kongregate the most x)

author: {'steamid': '76561198159392230', 'num_games_owned': 911, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 1013, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 813, 'last_played': 1528285056}
review:
Замечательная игра , спасибо автору за то, что добавил её)
Еще кодировку бы нормально настроил , то прям конфетка будет :3
Любимые персонажи :3 -- Фрай , Лила, Роджер, Бендер. (Футурама и Американский Папаша) , ну очень не хватает СИМПСОНОВ....
Ладно , все остальное напишу в [ +/- ]

Плюсы [ + ] :
1. Относительно интересные квесты.
2. Приятное , и в тоже время надоедающее музыкальное сопровождение. 
3. Графика - Кому как....
4. Веселье - Ну...порой смеялся)
5. Оптимизация - 60FPS...Хоть что-то сделали нормально :3
6. Сложность - Если против тебя попался чувак с высшим значением УРОНА\ЗДОРОВЬЯ.... - 50\50 , но ты проиграешь.... спасает только РОДЖЕР-ХУДОЖНИК.
7. Мультиплеер - Ну как бы его тут нет....ты играешь в PvP....но кажется , что это просто боты....а не АВТОБОЙ , или как он там называется))!
8. Добыча золотого г()вна РОДЖЕРА.... - Завалил одного СТЬЮИ - Получил 1к г*вна... Решил получить за второго - Ничего..... хоть бы предупреждали об этом.... Все ровно оставлю это в плюсах))
9. Устанавливайте , игра заманивает :3

Минусы [ - ] :
- Корявая кодировка , часто в СПЕЦ.ОБЪЯВЛЕНИЯХ показывает за место текста - [] (Прямоугольники вообщем , не скобки)

- Плохой перевод в некоторых местах , часто встречаю....То англ. текст , то русский текст...

- Мало "F.A.Q." , не понятны некоторые функции....

- Когда меняешь время , все таки удается обойти защиту...*Не злоупотребляю ,  т.к. толку с этого 0!* 

- Минусов много....но укажу пока что эти.

Рекомендую! 9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198041472188', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 14021, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1785, 'last_played': 1551734022}
review:
I enjoy the simplicity of this game. You win by the numbers. I wish I had more numbers in my wallet, though. Get it? It's a joke about paying to win. Oh, I crack myself up sometimes. :)
Anyway, Animation Throwdown is a fun card game. If you're obsessive, you'll either spend some money or you'll be frustrated at times.
I'd definitely recommend it to others. Being able to play on my phone or computer is pretty handy, too!

author: {'steamid': '76561197961040974', 'num_games_owned': 1354, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 2812, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 663, 'last_played': 1531282745}
review: This game is a horribly apt example of the pay to win timesinks that are a blight on the gaming world. Skip this one. Steam has way better free card games that also have mobile components. Take away the familiar characters and its just a bad game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092316310', 'num_games_owned': 334, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 2956, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 464, 'last_played': 1573707354}
review: After you pass your first initial go at the game you can only play the game for about 5-10 minutes every hour and a half unless of course you pay real money, Absolutely everything in the game costs money especially if you want to play for more than 5 minutes at a time. Out of all the pay to win games out there, this one is by far the most greedy and money demanding, trust me i know i play monster legends and clash of clans and this game is worse than both of those money grabbing games put together!!!! Save yourself and your wallet by just avoiding this game all together. Had a ton of potential but greed has destroyed this game imo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198312649990', 'num_games_owned': 40, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1036, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1036, 'last_played': 1499472197}
review:
Прекрасная игра, много карт над которыми можно понастольгировать. Ещё больше над которыми можно смеятся каждый раз когда её видишь)
из минусов лишь то что из паков с редкими картами падает чаще всего чепушня))0)
Донат в этой игре ЕСТЕСТВЕННО есть, ведь она фри ту плей) ,но он не решает. Можно и без него изи играть.
Особенно радует отношение разрабов. , всегда есть где по играть. Если уже нельзя играть на арене или в приключениях*, то можно пойти съиграть мини-турниры*, за которые после его окончания вам дадут призы,чем больше вы выигрываете-тем больше будет приз.
Игру советую. 7\10

author: {'steamid': '76561198203961431', 'num_games_owned': 192, 'num_reviews': 1356, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1499097040}
review:
Как карточная игра, получилась она немного дисбалансной, что не имеет места в играх подобного жанра.
Присутствуют разные режимы, карты и комбо карты, да и юмор неплох.
Разрабы делали ставки на то, что игра получит мой положительный палец из за юмора 2x2.
Но дисбаланс... Не...Не рекомендую.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135964156', 'num_games_owned': 207, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 534, 'last_played': 1709888926}
review:
Доброго времени суток, эта игра шикарная,начиная от графики и эффектов,заканчивая музыкой,вчера зашел и -10 часов из жизни. Залипаешь на долго и часто,не замечаешь как время пролетает!
Из минусов могу сказать лишь то,что энергия долго восстанавливается и карты трудно качать, так же отсутствие персонажей из симпсонов и саус парка.
В общем 9/10 ставлю этой игре. Фанаты оценят!

author: {'steamid': '76561198501100949', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 3150, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1600, 'last_played': 1505242861}
review:
An excellent example of simple gameplay that did not spoil the other components of the game.
We all know that production of the game in the existing world significantly reduces the cost of product development. In this case - it fact just went for the games quality. The game has perfectly timings, there is always something to do. Game sessions are optimal and are always full of interesting action. Maps, content is interesting to learn and collect. I recommend this game to everyone, it's worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095774367', 'num_games_owned': 176, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1586, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 705, 'last_played': 1653117432}
review:
Well, this was a very interesting game made mostly for fans of adult cartoons. In it, we have the worlds of Family Guy, American Dad, Bob’s Burgers, Futurama, and a ton more. There really isn’t much in terms of storyline as it’s just our loveable characters fighting each other in order to be the best. I believe this game was first a mobile game but I played it on Steam (it’s free there) and it was interesting.

There are way too many characters to talk about and pretty much all of them are well loved in the shows they came from so I don’t think I need to dive into the personalities of Steven Smith, Peter Griffin, and the bunch. If you want to know more about them, I will talk more about their personalities when I get to their cartoons in my long list of reviews. I chose one of my favorites from the starting characters, Brian Griffin, who also seemed to be the easier of the group. 

The game play is very simple; you make a deck and then fight against other decks in order to win battles, placing one card down per turn. Some cards can be merged together to make stronger cards but only after you know what they make using the fusion tubes. Although it is a very simple game, I have found that it’s not exactly a balanced game. If the other character gets the upper hand, it’s extremely hard to catch up to the point you can get overpowered easily. The problem stems I think with the fact you can only place one card down at a time. This includes if you’re fusing a card together, being that the other card you’re fusing with needs to be laid down the prier turn. You also have to have a card in front of the opponent’s cards in order to block an attack to your life points and to destroy the other’s card. Cards cannot attack other cards adjacent to each other (unless they have a random power), only in front of them. If your opponent has a long stream of cards in a row and you only have one card to block with, you’re in a lot of trouble. It’s just way to hard to bring up your defenses in time before your life points are 0. 

This came does have micro transactions (what game doesn’t have these now a days?) but it’s not a pay to win style. It’s easy to win coins and upgrade items free through doing the quests and just randomly going through the motions. 

The artwork looks just like they jumped out of their cartoons into this dimensional rift place where they are fighting. It’s all still images which doesn’t bother me seeing as this is the norm in most mobile games. I think the pictures for the cards are taken straight out of the episodes and luckily they used high quality images. The backgrounds are common places that we see in the shows only on a floating island and based off of what character you’re fighting. Fight Peter and the Griffin house is in the background, fight Bob and his burger shop is behind. 

Music is generic. I really didn’t pick out anything that stood out nor did I hear really anything that I could pick out as being from any of the cartoons. Weather they didn’t have the license for the music or just thought it would be a problem to bring it in, I’m not sure but I can understand why they didn’t really try. Most mobile games don’t have music that stands out or it loops over and over so after a while, I do tend to turn off the sound. We don’t even get the characters saying anything besides in speech bubbles so it’s not a big loss.

Overall, the game is alright, except for the problem with balancing. Even with the problem with balancing, I found myself interested in the strange fusions I could make and trying to level up the characters I could play as. It’s a pretty simple sit back game made to just have fun with it and waste some time, get achievements in steam or google play, and just have fun with your favorite characters.

author: {'steamid': '76561198082937823', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1509915633}
review:
ЛЯ В ШО БЫ ПОИГРАТЬ
ПЛЮСЫ:
1.Легкий и не замысловатый геймплей , вообще это спорно многие играют в карточные игры ради того что бы мозги кипели, здесь такого не будет
2. Механика карт, Объединение двух карт в одну очень интерсная механика ,если приводит пример : 3/3 карта (например наркотики)+2/7 карта = 4/8 карта такого я еще не видел
3.Графика , простая не требовательная , но выглядит достойно
МИНУСЫ:
1. Донат, честно увидев цену на карты просто вау одна карта 1000 обычной валюты и не факт что выпадет что то дельное , но ведь есть другие так сказать комлект с редкой картой но он стоит 150 валюты за донат
2.Сервера , Лично у меня встала такая проблема то что вечером просто не получается комфортно играть все время разрывы соединения , но ведь соединение хорошое я ведь не в деревне живу(нет порноху не качал во время игры)
Честно не знаю куда отнести эти пункты:
1Нужна регистрация в другом сервисе(не такие как uplay) 
2Сюжет вроде любителям сериалов должно зайти но как слабоват сюжет
РАУНД

author: {'steamid': '76561198030778687', 'num_games_owned': 119, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1555440147}
review:
[h1]Красивая игра с любимымии персонажами[/h1]

Отправляйтесь за поиском карт с любимыми персонажами. Собирайте, улучшайте, комбинируйте карты и выставляйте их против других!

И делать это можно как на компьютере, так и на телефоне. Игра сохраняет прогресс. И поиграв сидя дома на ПК, вы можете продолжить на телефоне в дороге. Очень удобно.

Игра радует глаза. Красочная и яркая картинка. А прорисовкой карт можно просто любоваться. 

В игре есть юмор. Каждая карта описана забывным фактом, реплики персонажей перед каждам боем, квест-сценки - все это может заставить улыбнуться.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078049022', 'num_games_owned': 821, 'num_reviews': 128, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 76, 'last_played': 1627596755}
review:
Animation Throwdown, es un CCG (Collectible Card Game)  Free to play basado en los personajes de las series de la cadena de animación Fox y 20th televisión.

Calificacion: 6/10

Jugabilidad: 
El juego se basa en derrotar a tu opononte mediante cartas, las cuales representan a un protagonista de alguna serie, haciendo uso de estrategias a partir de los poderes y atributos que tienen los mismos. Se puede jugar “una campaña” o vs otras personas.

Gráficos:
Bastante bien, es un juego que no requiere muchos graficos.

Sonido:
La musicalización no es la mejor. Deja bastante que desear

Multijugador: 
Lo importante es que anda bien

Conclusión:
Es un juego de carta entretenido, no pierdes nada con bajarlo y probarlo. Si te gustan las series y tenes paciencia te va gustar y poder armar tus distintos mazos.
Es un CCG mas de todos los que hay hoy en día, no se destaca mucho mas, PERO es Free to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100328954', 'num_games_owned': 187, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 480, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1595364174}
review: Игра очень хорошая. Но иногда пишет " Медленная Сеть" при этом другие приложения работают нормально. Я иногда заёбываюсь перезапускать игру

author: {'steamid': '76561198079286314', 'num_games_owned': 149, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1498433013}
review:
Какой интернет нужен для этой игры? Минимум 200мбит/с? При моих 100 вечно пишет "Медленная сеть"...(может у меня действительно проблема с сетью, но, вроде, ютаб грузит HD видосики сразу) Куча доната, который влияет на игровой процесс, а значит и баланс, также система ограничения энергии - это полный пи3дец, как такое вообще в стим попало? Ладно на мобиле, там каждая 100 игра НЕ с ограничением энергии (может уже и по-другому, год не качал игр на телефон). Баланс в игре тоже так себе, на высоких уровнях, на арене, боты просто жития не дают, нужен донат.

Из плюсов - смешные названия карт, изображения на картах.
 
В общем: скачал эту игру просто чтоб выполнить фаст задание для летней распродажи, посмотрел на выполнение квестов, посмотрел, что выпадает из наборов за 1000 внутр. вал. (а за миссию даётся 50 внутр. вал.), получил шлак - прочекал, что пишут в комментах - поддержал. Вот действительно, игра на пару минут, чисто для выполнения стимовского задания на ачивку - Всё. 
P.S. Спасибо, что прочитали данный обзор.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022911583', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 186, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1498391293}
review:
For the first time it looked fine and I thought finally an original idea. Later as I played a bit more it turned out that this is just another pay to win game. 

Another reason why I decided to write this review is the battle mechanics is so flawed that it hurts to play... Since the whole battle is automatic and you only need to play cards, even only from left to right, so if you play a strong card first (luck) and quickly upgrade it, then the opponent will have no chance of playing a card, because it will be destroyed immediately, and you play the second card, and so on. And that's it, you have no way of altering the game from then on. No effect, environment cards or anything to gain control over the happenings again.

Not to mention the connection issues. In a few hours of game time I needed to restart the game like 5 times if not more, because of "Slow connection" notification and the game froze.

No way of adding friends at least it's not quite obvious how to do so if there is an option.

All together the game looks good for me and the idea would be great, but the game mechanics and the pay to win system  just kill all the good thoughts I had for this game initially.

Disappointing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062448641', 'num_games_owned': 2313, 'num_reviews': 306, 'playtime_forever': 1158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1157, 'last_played': 1634747846}
review:
[h1]СОБЕРИ ИХ ВСЕХ![/h1]

Карточные игры в Стиме перестали быть редкостью (когда же уже карточных Дурака, 1000, Паука, Пьяницу добавят? ГЕЙБ, МЫ ЖДЕМ!): кто-то играет в свежак по серии TES, кто-то все еще осваивает проблемы в Астробое - а нам же достался особый случай с никому ничего не говорящим названием. Однако начинка может показаться если не вкусной, то как минимум удобоваримой. А теперь мы двинем в бургерный фургон Боба.

Собрав под одной крышей персонажей многих мультсериалов студии FOX (но не всех, будем честны) и даже обосновав такое сближение несближаемого - хотя бы по части визуала - создатели игры создали карточную игру, часть контента которой может нас взбесить или заставить ожесточенно играть до момента окончания лимита доступных действий, а также жестоко поиметь наши ностальгические чувства.

Так как знаком я до начала игры был только с персонажами Family Guy и Futurama, то и обращал внимание своё только на них. Потому, посмотрев полностью все сезоны Футурамы несколько лет назад, морально я отдыхал, посматривая, как карта с Лилой-качком уфигачивала какого-то очередного Хэнка - короче говоря, как фанат сериала, я говорю игре ДА. Плюс рисовка, повторяющая один в один оригиналы, какой-никакой стимул качать, улучшать и изучать карты, ибо без этого режим "истории" не пройти (хотя я хз, когда смогу его одолеть), да еще возможность познакомиться ближе с сериалами, о которых никогда не слышал. Я таким макаром аж захотел Bob's burgers начать смотреть, Луиза прикольным персонажем смотрится...

Но, как и любой бесплатной игры в Стиме, есть и у данного примера минусы. Первым и самым главным является донат. Дальше - постоянное ожидание возможности выполнить новые действия и невозможность бесплатно промотать его (то есть, через часы на своем компе, что естественно серьезный минус, ибо мы все ценим свое время, верно?)). Ну а завершает триаду отсутствие Симпсонов.

Последнее вполне можно понять: за все время существования сериала там появилось столько героев, что вместить даже основных - уже задача из задач. Плюс, несмотря на свою явную стагнацию, Симпсоны продолжают оставаться одним из лучших мультсериалов, то есть очень популярными. На их фоне все эти Короли холма или Американские папаши смотрятся непрезентабельно, соответственно, и внимание всё от них бы отвлекалось. А ведь игра-то существует по сути как кроссовер-реклама этих самых сериалов, чего Симпсонам, как раскрученному бренду, уже не нужно.

Спрашивается - а зачем тогда там Футурама, она же закончилась года четыре назад? Мое мнение - чтобы порадовать фанатов (ну и обосновать сам синтез несинтезируемого). Хотя формата карточной игры всё же недостаточно для этого, ибо нет интересных ситуаций и диалогов, есть лишь карточки с любимыми персонажами. И за это только я могу рекомендовать игру.

[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/32313063/] Куратор	[/url]

Ставьте лайк, подписывайтесь на кураторскую страничку и ищите новое в играх!)

author: {'steamid': '76561198059659119', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 23881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1823, 'last_played': 1579585532}
review:
Doy mi critica poco antes de tener las 30 horas de juego. De entrada es excelente y muy recomendado, a pesar de que muchos veo que dicen que es Pay to Win, por lo que llevo no lo es necesariamente, yo tengo un mazo ya donde un 80% de mis cartas son azules y no le he invertido 1 solo peso, así que para mi si fue Free to play siempre y cuando seas paciente y lo juegues poco a poco a su ritmo que te deje el mismo juego.

El juego me encanto, ya que tiene una mecanica sensilla y apta para todos, aparte de personajes de series que me encantan, hay que tener paciencia para tener muchas fuciones y tener un mazo fuerte, siento que lo único que le falta el jugar en linea directamente con otro jugador, no con su mazo solamente como se hace hasta el momento.

En resumen les recomiendo mucho el juego, esta en español y les puede dar horas de diversión sin costo alguno.

review:
Before I start , i want to let you  guys know that this game was made back in 2016 as a phone game , only with shows from FOX , so this is why  the other shows like Rick and Morty and such are not in the game.

Quick review

PROS:
-your favorite characters from 5 good shows;
-a card game with them , why not?
-interesting concept;

CONS:
-the game it plays himself like 80% of the time;
-P2W


Overall: Pretty little game , nice for a casual sunday gaming evening or something , but if u want to get far in this game you better have that wallet pretty fat...

8/10 from my perspective

author: {'steamid': '76561198179438233', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 724, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1615995695}
review:
Oyunu bu kadar kısa süre oynadığıma bakmayın, mobil versiyonunu 4-5 gün oynadım. Steam'de gördüm bilgisayarda da oynamamışlığımız kalmasın diye indirdim. Oyunun mantığı size verilen ve sandık(crate)'lardan toplayabileceğiniz kartlarla oynanan basit mekanikli bir kart oyunu. Arenalarda insanlarla savaşıp yeni kahramanların kilidini açmak. Ayrıca oyuna en sevdiğimiz televizyon şovlarını koyunca oyun mükkemmel oluyor, ama işin içine sürekli savaş kombolarının kilidini açmak için beklenen uzun zaman (1sa-8sa), savaşlara girmeniz için kullanmanız gereken Energy Bar denilen her savaşta bir tık azalan ve dolmasını beklemeniz gereken şeyler, ve etrafa serpiştirilmiş pay2win kokusu, sürekli oyunun başa sarması, sürekli bir anda size almanız için gösterilen sınırlı süreli teklifler... oyunu çoğu zaman kötü kılan unsurlar.

Her şeye rağmen oyunu ilgi çekici yapmışlar. Eleştirilerin bir kenara bırakılıp en az bir kere oynanması gereken oyun. Arada çıkan espiriler, geçişler ve basit mekaniği ile benden artıyı aldı Animation Throwdown.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145722252', 'num_games_owned': 56, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 11839, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3300, 'last_played': 1505128445}
review: Игра прикольная. Как поклоннику FOX и 2x2 зашла на ура. Понравилось, что можно синхронизировать прогресс с планшетом или телефоном и играть с разных устройсв где бы ты не находился. Единственное напрягает дикий перевес в сторону мобильных устройств, так как играя с них можно получить значительно больше ништячков почти за тот же промежуток времени.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126086182', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 165, 'playtime_forever': 352, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1558731361}
review:
Un juego de cartas ligero enfocado a los fans (o al menos simpatizantes) de las series animadas de FOX.
Hasta bien entrado el juego, no supone ningún reto, es demasiado fácil. Pero no por ello te divertirás menos, el juego se ocupa de darte los chistes y situaciones suficientes como mantenerte entretenido. Como véis, no es un Hearthstone; pero os será útil en las pausas para el café.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084082181', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 11424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 612, 'last_played': 1517495293}
review:
brilliant game but its pay to win, it gets to a stage where you just can't go any further unless you buy from the shop. 
Pros are brilliant cards, Lots of fun, Funny combos, PVP and PVE. 
Cons are you have to pay to win, it disconnects you alot even with full internet, You also have timers on researching.
8/10 because i really enjoy it despite the fact it's becoming impossible to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198145542698', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 795, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 795, 'last_played': 1497561217}
review: Really cool game! Gave me flashbacks to the good ol' days of King of the Hill, and American Dad, Family Guy, and Bob's Burgers. The card game is very fluent and easy to learn, the cards are interesting and definitely make me remember the episodes that "Pro-Pain!" was introduced. The cards being merged for better stats made me nostalgic from remembering each version of the character. This game is a must for fans of all of the shows, and a great card game for those card nerds. The game is amazing, and I love it to bits!

author: {'steamid': '76561197966618149', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 47190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 383, 'playtime_at_review': 2827, 'last_played': 1712445667}
review:
It's a fun game, and I will continue to play it, despite everything I'm about to say (the first combo I put on the table was "Condom Chris," and I was hooked).  This game, like most P2W however, is geared toward folks who have way too much money or way too much time.  For the rest of us, we can grind, persist, and then kick the nearest concrete wall.

Pros:

1) It's free, and you don't have to spend any money on it (this is also one of its downfalls, as I'll mention later).

2) It's really fun if you like CCG's.

3) Linking to #2 (hahaha!), you get a lot of nostalgia from all the different cards and combos.  

4) There's a ton of combos out there for folks to play with, and the different abilities they afford (for tactical and strategic purposes) are quite varied.

Cons:

1) Refering to #1 in the pros, this game is gated for those who are not willing to drop real money.  The reward system is set up to pamper the elites with more elite cards at a more lucrative rate, and this becomes exponential.  It's like the worst Ark server you can imagine, but a CCG - if you're not rocking mythics, then you'll never be able to qualify in competitions to reap things to unlock mythics (unless you pay).

Shit, that's a lesson for real life.  

Anyway...

2)  Some of the combos make ZERO sense, yet they're dominating.  A fat fish can destroy the captain of a starship?  I don't care how German it is - I CALL SHENANIGANS!!!

Conclusion:

Get ready to grind some flour, or you'll have to pony up the dough.  Either way, you're going to run in to a group of Zack Brannigans using nothing but legendary combos.  If at any point you feel like you're starting to do well, you're about to get an uninvited dose of reality up the rectum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198358689402', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1496623751}
review: I've played for a little bit, so my review should only be considered by people who want a look into the first few moments rather than an in-depth look at the game. The game looks like it will be a battle between the 5 shows listed, and there may be some sort of supremacy, but I did not see that upon entering it. The "introduction" to the game looked like something from a mobile game and felt too simple to enjoy. The mechanics of the card game itself were disappointing; you place down a character card on your turn, nd on your next turn, you can place another character down or add a power-up card to a card currently on the field to make it stronger (Example: Bullock+Alcohol: Drunk Bullock). The two stats are attack and health, similar to games like Magic the Gathering, but there isn't any depth to attacking. The game auto-attacks for you, so as long as you outnumber your opponent, you will always win. The game also pushes for "research", allowing you to unlock new combinations of power-ups and characters. This seems like a decent mechanic to keep things balanced, but the use of microtransactions in order to feed corporate interests ruins the integrity. There are also challenges to tackle, but they are hardly interesting. Also, the lack of music from the shows themselves or any type of voice acting makes this game oddly quiet and boring. My opinion isn't based on hours of playing so you do not need to take my opinion to the highest regard, but from a first-look standpoint, it was not worth it. I would not recommend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064261649', 'num_games_owned': 1582, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 16, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1496730556}
review:
People complaining about free games asking for money is like people complaining about taxes while on wellfare or commercials on TV or ads on the internet.  How do they expect these companies to survive.  You have an option to either pay or not pay.  I've played this game for many hours on my Android tablet and was glad to see it on Steam for achievements and trading cards.

I've not spent one dime on the game and love the humor of mixing up the animation shows that I enjoy.  If you like card cames that are fast paced once you get to know them this is for you.  Good fun, great conrtols on Steam, awesome graphics and a good laugh now and again!  What more could I ask for, for free?  OH, I know. It transfers my game back and forth from my Android to my PC on steam.  THAT ROCKS!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198109771655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2117, 'last_played': 1496722511}

author: {'steamid': '76561198041512403', 'num_games_owned': 1837, 'num_reviews': 2465, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1496662110}
review:
애니메이션 카드 배틀.

카드의 이미지가 애니메이션에 등장하는 캐릭터들입니다.
아는 애니메이션이나 캐릭터면 왠지모를 반가움을 느낄 수 있죠.

게임은 턴 방식으로, 각자는 자신의 턴에 1장의 카드를 드로우하고 1장의 카드를 필드에 오픈할 수 있습니다. 
참고로 위치는 고정으로, 1번 슬롯의 카드들끼리 2번 슬롯의 카드들끼리 전투를 합니다.
상대 슬롯이 비어있으면 플레이어를 직접 공격하며, 상대 카드가 받고 남은 데미지를 상대에게 줄 수 있습니다.
예로, 공격력 5인 카드가 체력 3인 카드를 처치했다면, 남은 2의 공격력을 상대 플레이어에게 주죠.

카드는 캐릭터 카드과 변신 카드로 나뉘어집니다.
각각의 카드 모두 필드에 배치할 수 있는데, 특이한 점은 둘을 융합할 수 있다는 점입니다.
캐릭터 카드를 필드에 배치하고 장비 카드를 해당 카드에 가져가면 변신을 합니다.
이를 통해서 캐릭터 카드는 공격력과 체력이 상승하고, 특수 스킬을 얻는 경우가 있습니다.
반대의 경우도 가능하지만, 손에 들고있는 상태에서는 불가능하죠.

물론, 모든 카드가 융합이 가능한 것은 아닙니다.
카드마다 융합이 가능한 카드가 존재하며, 새로운 융합 소재를 찾아내야하기도 하죠.
융합 캡슐을 이용하여 캐릭터 카드와 변신 카드를 일정시간(보통 1시간) 넣어두고,
시간이 지나 새로운 융합 카드를 얻으며, 전투에서 사용 가능합니다.

특수 스킬이 다양합니다. 독, 회복, 흡혈, 벽, 대신 방어, 펀치, 공격력 하락 등등.
또한, 전투 시 특정 변신 카드를 사용하여 융합한 캐릭터는 특수 효과를 받기도 합니다.
공격력 상승/ 체력 회복 등.

아쉬운 점
-캐릭터와 변신 카드 구별이 힘듬
-융합 목록에서 필터가 있으면 좋을 듯 함(융합 가능 카드 모록)
-가끔 24%에서 게임 로딩이 멈추는 경우가 있음(재설치 시 정상 실행)

author: {'steamid': '76561197981346879', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 9841, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6787, 'last_played': 1576945757}
review:
Ну только если вам совсем делать не чего...

Очередное "шедевр" для мобильных устройств призванное тащить из вас бабло. Побеждает тот, кто влил больше бабла. У кого бьлше бабла, у того карты лучше, у кого карты лучше тот и победил.

Но! При большом терпении можно обойтись и без доната. Вопрос только в том, как много у вас уйдёт время на сбор хороших карт и не случиться ли так, что к тому времени вы будите уже на пенсии, и эта игра будет нафиг никому не нужна. Удачи.

Хотя надо отметить, что игра подсаживает вас на "собирательство".

author: {'steamid': '76561198031887977', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1496499113}
review:
I played this game on Kongregate before playing it here. Back then I just had one thing to say and that still hasn't changed so...

"BOOOOH"

This game is awful, again this is another game that advertises itself as free. But if you want to get anywhere in this game, you'll have to pay up. Of course everything can be done by waiting and grinding, but if you've ever played this game you know why that sucks.

As far as the gameplay goes, it's a card game. I never liked card or dice games on computers, mainly because I feel as I get cheated a lot. Eventually your cards won't matter, you're going to need better ones. Then your opponents get stronger and have abilities, kicking your butt even more, so you'll need those too. More time, more grinding, more waiting, but if you pay them now, well you're an idiot. Why, whould you even do that? What's the point of paying for a FREE game?

During playing I kept wondering two things, why is Futurama in here? From all the shows this game uses, Futurama is actually funny while the rest aren't. And the second thing was King of Hill, does that even still get aired?

For the rest, don't play this game, don't waste your time. There are so many things you could be doing that are much more fun and actually are FREE. Go for a walk, rearrange your sock drawer, bake a pie, go outside and start counting rocks.

If at the end of your day you still feel like wasting money, go ahead and throw your change into the sewer or pay a dominatrix to step on your testicals (if you have them). My guess is you'll get more satisfaction out of either of those than out of this.

review:
A game with an easy concept but an indepth and clever playstyle. 

Didn't think the game would offer much at first, thought the niche of having popular animated TV shows bundled together and thrown in a game would result in a short lived failed attempt. 

The game is rather clever and fun to play. There's plenty of cards and decks available, challenges, pvp, story and the ability to unlock further combinations and features for your cards. 

There's plenty the game has to offer and as far as I can tell it's not working on a pay to win basis.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034985684', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 1778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 592, 'last_played': 1565652958}
review:
P2W und einige Karten sind Sehr Krass op.

Ich spiels zwar immernoch aber eig nur da ich es schon seit der Alpha dattel und somit einpaar Vorteile als Alpha Spieler bekam Bsp. Forschungszeit wurde reduziert glaub auf die hälfte dennoch brauch ich ab und an 2h, 6h oder 24h je nach Kartenwert, wie eine Violette und Blaue sinds nach wie vor 24h, zudem bekam ich Inventar Erweiterung und glaub noch anderen kram.

Bei der PC Version wurde auch der 50% Coins (InGame Währung) Bonus durch Werbevideos herrausgenommen und etz muss man irwas kaufen und bekommt für 24h diesen Bonus von 50% auf Coins, x1.5 Bonus auf Karten raritäten drop oder Avatar Xp, Avatar xp bekommt man über PvP dort zählt benötigt man die Chance, aber man kann auch Avatare durch die Challenges bekommen einfach spielen und sparen und dann für die dortigen Coins kaufen.

Seltenheit sind Grau, Grün, Blau und Violett/Rosa irwas dazwischen und Sagenhaft die so Gelb/Orange sind aber ka genau wie man die Sagenhafte bekommt sah sie schon bei nen Pack.

Die ersten drei bekommt man durch den Story Mode sind zwar einige aber glaub insgesamt nur 10 verschieden blaue Karte (Nicht sicher) von bei weiten mehr und den Rest bekommt man nur durch Kartenpacks, dort sah ich bis etz auch nur Grau und Grün und ein Pack mit nur EINER Karte kostet 1000Coins sind zwar einfach zu bekommen aber der Loot ist n Witz wenn ich mir für 50.000Coins Packs kaufe bekomme ich eigentlich NUR NUTZLOSE Graue und n paar Grüne die weniger Nutzlosen Karten.

Anfangs sind sie zwar nützlich aber später braucht man die nicht mehr nutze vill nur noch 2 von den Grauen mehr nicht,  aber immehin kann man die für Aufwertungsmaterial VK

In übrigen kann man auch nicht bei den 1k Coins Karten einsehen was es dort zu ziehen gibt also wer sagt das dort überhaupt Rarität über Grün drin sind?

Wer viel Gedult hat kommt auch so Vorran auch Grüne Karten können op werden.

Und traut euch auch den PvP zu machen das Passt sich eurer Stufe an zudem bekommt man Loot für den man auch Blaue oder besser craften kann.

Für Bsp. 1000 Edelstein(PvP Loot) kann man eine blaue craften klingt viel aber nach 3 ich nenn sie mal PvP Season hat man eigentlich genug sofern man regelmäßig in dieser Zeit glaub 2 Tage, PvP spielte.

review:
The game is a lot of fun the first few days, but once you really get into it, you learn that in order to actually compete, you have to pay for gems and card packs unless you want to win only 1 in 4 hands... there is no actual pvp, it takes a persons name and plops it on to an ai hand... so forget about battling brains with your friends cuz thats not going to happen. 

Last thing, if you link your account on their website, you still don't get the actual benefit of doing so, so don't waste your time.

review:
It's a money pit. Just that - the further you go in the game, the less chace you have to win without spending real money. You would not get better cars, energy to do quest, power up cards or fasten the time to match cards which is maybe even the most important thing in the game. Oh and achi problems, I didn't get mine after getting 5 rank (and i've done quest for it in game).

But I'm stubborn and kinda enjoy this card game, so I'm gonna keep playing for a while and still be complaining about how bad it is - probably it's some sign of masochism but :P

author: {'steamid': '76561198092069785', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 25617, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1596884546}
review:
Многие ноют что, мол игра не online вовсе, так вот начну с того, что online игра не подразумевает сражение в реальном времени против других игроков как таковое.
Онлайн-игра — игра, использующая постоянное соединение с Интернетом. 
Если до вас это не доходит это ваша проблема.
+ данной игры :
1) Нет долгого ожидания оппонента( как в том же Hearthstone)
2) Широкий спектр героев на выбор
3) Возможность прокачать героя и карты
4) Целых 5 анимационных шоу в одной игре  (Симпсонам тут не место)
5) Огромный выбор карт и различных их комбинаций 
6)Есть шанс выбить  неплохие карты из challenge, Goldet turds   паков,( в том числе и мистические).
7) Наличие Рамблов ( битв лиг) и наград за них. Где наличие лиги и ее рейтинг имеет ключевое значение. ( в сильную лигу без 15+ pvp ранга не попасть)
8) Ну и конечно халявные кристаллы ежедневные, и за конкурсы. ( по 800+ кристалов в месяц)
Что вполне хватает на покупку нескольких паков карт без доната.
- данной игры :
1) Возможность фармить кристалы за выполенеие рекламных оферт нет в Steam.
2) Нет возможности получить бонус за просмотр рекламмы, только за донат

Есть еще мелкие недостатки, но они не существенны. 
Без доната играть вполне возможно. Занять топовые позиции конечно не удастся, но все же определенных высот достичь можно.

Оценка 9/10.
